src: thusa go thibelwe letsatsi la tlhokagalo ya metsi more matshediso efapha la metsi le kge leloleswe (dws) le di risana le ba toropokgolo ya kapa go namola leuba kwa kapa bokone, leuba le le masisi le le iseng le bonwe mo dingwa geng di le lesome.
tgt: siza ukulwisana nosuku lokuntuleka kwamanzi more matshediso umnyango wezamanzi nokuthuthwa kwendle (idws) usebenzisana nedolobha lasekapa ukulwisana nesomiso entshonalanga kapa, okuyisomiso esibi kwesezike zahlasela eminyakeni eyishumi.

src: go ya ka ba dws ga go dipula tse di lekaneng tse di neleng mme seelo sa metsi mo matamong se wetse tlase.
tgt: ngokwedws kube nokuntuleka kwezimvula futhi kwehla nezinga lamanzi emadamini.

src: seno se gapeleditse bothati go tlhagisa dikgato tse di gagamet seng go diegisa kgonagalo ya tl hokagalo ya metsi, fa dithepe di kgala metsi.
tgt: lokhu sekwenze iziphathi mandla zibeke izinyathelo eziqi nile ukunweba isikhathi sokufika kosuku lokuntuleka kwamanzi, lapho amathangi azobe omile.

src: toropokgolo ya kapa e diragatsa legato la selekanyetso sa 6b.
tgt: idolobha lasekapa liqala imikhawulo yezinga u6b.

src: seno se raya gore motho a le mongwe o na le tiriso ya selekanyetso sa letsatsi sa dilitara tsa metsi di le 50 kgotsa kwa tlase, e ka tswa e le kwa gae, tirong, sekolong kgotsa gongwe le gongwe.
tgt: lokhu kuchaza ukuthi kuzoba nomkhawulo wansuku zonke wamalitha amanzi angama50 noma angaphansi kumuntu ngamunye, osekhaya, emsebenzini, esikoleni noma kwenye indawo.

src: fa toropokgolo e ntse e tsepa misitse maiteko otlhe a yona mo go thibeleng letsatsi la tlhokaga lo ya metsi, ya re e tshwanela go nna e ipaakanyeditse maemo ao a tla e kgontshang go laola metsi a yona le go a lelefatsa go fitlha setlha sa mariga se goroga.
tgt: njengoba idolobha ligxile emizamweni yokulwisana nosuku lokuntuleka kwamanzi, lithe lidinga ukulungiselela isimo lapho lizokwazi ukulawula uhlelo lwedolobha lokuthunyelwa kwamanzi ukuze kuze kufike ubusika.

src: "re tla tswala metsi a a yang kwa dithepeng fa matamo a rona otlhe a fitlha go seelo sa dipere sente di le 13.5. fa fela seelo sa matamo se fitlha go diperesente di le 13.5, ba tla simolola go tswala dipeipe tsa metsi, ntle le mo ma felong a a botlhokwa a kgwebo le mo ditheong tse di jaaka maokelo, go rialo toropokgolo mo polelo e ba e ba e dirileng.
tgt: "sizokuvala ukuthunyelwa kwamanzi kompompi uma amadamu ethu efika ezingeni elingu13.5%.

src: fela fa seno se simolola go di ragala, baagi ba tla bona metsi mo mafelong a go gelela metsi go ralala toropokgolo.
tgt: uma izinga lamadamu lifika ku13.5%, bazoqala ukuvala amapayipi athumela amanzi, ngaphandle kwezindawo zezamabhizinisi ezisemqoka kanye nezikhungo, ezifana nezibhedlela," ngokulandisa kwedolobha esitatimendeni salo.

src: moagi a le mongwe o tla neelwa dilitara di le 25 tsa metsi ka letsatsi.
tgt: uma sekufika lesi sikhathi, izakhamuzi zizokwazi ukuthola amanzi ezizindeni eziphakela ngamanzi edolobheni lonkana.

src: toropokgolo e simolotse ka tik watikwe e e dirang ka tiragalo tsa matlhotlhapelo (doc) go diraga tsa leano la matlhotlhapelo a a tlholwang ke metsi le le tla diraga diwang fa go ka tlhokagala metsi.
tgt: isakhamuzi ngasinye sizokwabelwa amalitha amanzi anga ma25 ngosuku.

src: didiba tse di borilweng toropokgolo ga e rotloetse tiriso ya didiba tse di borilweng tse di kwa ntle ga dikago mme ya re go nosetsa ka metsi a tsona go tla beelwa selekanyetso sa ura e le nngwe fela ka bolabobedi le bolamatlhatso, pele ga 9am le morago ga 6pm.
tgt: idolobha selivule isikhungo esisebenza ngezinhlekelele (idoc) ukusebenzisa uhlelo lwamanzi lwenhlekelele, oluzoqala uma sekufike usuku lokuntuleka kwamanzi.

src: "tiriso ya metsi a a tswang mo didibeng tse di borilweng /petseng e tshwanetse e nne le mmetara mme botlhe ba ba a di risang ba tshwanetse go tshola direkoto mme ba di tlhagise ka nako ya fa go tlhatlhobiwa", toropokgolo e rialo.
tgt: amapitsiidolobha selikugxekile ukusetshenziswa kwamapitsi futhi lathi ukusetshenziswa kwawo ukuze kuniselwe kuzoba ihora elilodwa kuphela ngolwesibili kanye nangomgqibelo, ngaphambi kwehora lesi9 ekuseni futhi ngemuva kwehora lesi6 ntambama.

src: e tlaleleditse ka gore baagi ba tshwanetse go bona tetla go tswa go dws fa ba rata go reki sa kgotsa go reka metsi a sediba se se borilweng/petse.
tgt: "ukusetshenziswa kwamapitsi okanye imithombo yamanzi kufanele kukalwe ngamamitha futhi bonke abakusebenzisayo bagcine amarekhodi azotholakala uma kufanele ahlolwe," kusho idolobha.

src: jaaka karolo ya maiteko a puso go laola tiriso ya metsi, dws e ne ya re bothati bo diragatsa dikgato tse di gagametseng go bona seelo se se lekanyedits weng sa metsi se obamelwa.
tgt: lengeze ngokuthi izakhamuzi kufanele zithole imvume kudws uma zifuna ukudayisa noma ukuthenga amanzi asemapitsini/nasemithonjeni yamanzi.

src: toropokgolo e dirisana le ba ti ragatso ya molao le ba yuniti ya dipatlisiso tse di kgethegileng (special investigating unit) go diragatsa kobamelo ya seleka nyetso sa metsi.
tgt: njengomzamo kahulumeni wokulawula ukusetshenziswa kwamanzi, idws ithe iziphathimandla zibeke izinyathelo eziqinille ukuqikelela ukuthi ukuphakelwa kwamanzi ngendlela ebekelwe imikhawulo kuyalandelwa.

src: go tsaya dikgato kgatlhanong le batlolamolao lefapha le sa tswa go dira ka tshwaraganelo le toropokgolo le tsepile mo ditiragalong tse di seng mo molaong tse di maleba na le metsi kwa mfuleni.
tgt: idolobha futhi lisebenzisana nethimba eliqinisekisa uku landelwa komthetho kanye nophiko oluphenyayo olukhethekile ukuqikelela ukulandelwa komthetho.

src: maikaelelo e le go rarabolola ditiragalo tsotlhe tsa go se obamele kgotsa go se diragatse selekanyetso se se beilweng sa metsi, segolobogolo mafelo a go tlhatswa dijanaga a a seng ka fa molaong.
tgt: ukuthathela izinyathelo abaphula umthetho umnyango ngokuhlanganyela nedolobha usanda kugasela emfuleni, ugxile ezenzweni zokusetshenziswa kwamanzi ngokungekho semthethweni.

src: "go ya ka legato la toropok golo la selekanyetso sa 6b, metsi a mmasepala a a leng mo metemeng e mennye ga a ne a dirisediwa go tlhatswa dikoloi.
tgt: lo mkhankaso kuhloswe ngawo ukudingida ukuphulwa kwemithetho kwamanje kanye nokulandela imikhawulo yamanzi, futhi uqondiswe ikakhulukazi ezikhungweni eziwasha izimoto ngokungekho emthethweni.

src: mafelo a a seng mo molaong a a tlhatswang dikoloi a dirisa met si a le mantsi.
tgt: "ngokwamazinga emikhawulo 6b yedolobha, amanzi kama sipala angaphuzwa ngeke asetshenziswe ukuwasha izimoto.

src: palo ya beng ba mafelo a a go tlhatswa dikoloi ba dirisa dipeipi tse di ikemet seng mo dikgwebong tsa bona, mme ba bangwe ba dirisa metsi go tswa mo dithepeng" go rialo lefapha.
tgt: izindawo zokuwasha izimoto ezingekho emthethweni zisebenzisa amanzi amaningi.

src: le fa go le dikemedi di le dintsi tse di boineelo tse di dirang ka metsi, go thusa go efoga le tsatsi la tlhokagalo ya metsi, toropokgolo e dirile boikuelo mo baaging ba yona go nna le seabe mo go somareleng metsi.
tgt: abanikazi bezindawo zokuwasha izimoto abaningi basebenzisa ompompi abafakelwe umphakathi emabhizinisini abo, abanye basebenzisa amanzi ompompi babo," kuchaza umnyango.

src: "re tlhoka botlhe ba ba di risang metsi go ikamaganya le maiteko a setlhopha sa toro pokgolo ya kapa," go rialo mot latsammeyara wa toropokgolo ya kapa ian neilson.
tgt: nakuba emaningi amanxusa amanzi azimisele asebenzayo ukusiza ukunqanda usuku lokuntuleka kwamanzi, idolobha licele izakhamuzi ukuba zidlale indima yazo ekongeni amanzi.

src: maele a go somarela metsi tswala thepe fa o tlhapa meno, o beola kgotsa o tshasa sesepa mo diatleng.
tgt: "sifuna bonke abasebenzisa amanzi bajoyine imizamo yedolobha lasekapa," ngokusho kwephini likasodolobha wasekapa uian neilson.

src: dirisa šawara go tlhapa mme o dirise metsi a mannye fa o tlhapa.
tgt: amasu okonga amanzi vala umpompi uma uxubha, ushefa noma ugcoba insipho ezandleni ngena eshaweni isikhashana futhi usebenzise amanzi amancane uma ugeza gwema ukusebenzisa amanzi athengwayo.

src: koloi dirisa kgamelo le sepontšhe fela go tlhatswa koloi.
tgt: imoto washa imoto yakho ngebhakede nesiphontshi kuphela.

src: phaposi ya go tlhapa šawara mo boemong ba go dirisa bata go tlhapa.
tgt: amagumbi okugeza ngena eshaweni esikhundleni sikabhavu sebenzisa amanzi amancane kubhavu geza izingane ezincane ndawonye fulasha indlu yangasese kuphela uma kunephunga beka isitini endishini yamanzi okufulasha ukunciphisa ukusetshenziswa kwamanzi.

src: dirisa metsi a mannye fa o dirisa bata go tlhapa.
tgt: ekhishini sebenzisa usinki ovalwayo uma ugeza izitsha, esikhundleni sikampompi sebenzisa insipho yokugeza izitsha encane, ukugwema isidingo sokuhlambulula sebenzisa usinki ovaliwe uma uhlambulula imifino, esikhundleni sikampompi sebenzisa amanzi owasebenzise ukuhlambulula izithelo nemifino uma unisela izitshalo.

src: baya setena ka fa gare ga sisitene go fokotsa tiriso ya metsi.
tgt: amalungu omphakathi ayacelwa ukuba asebenzise amamitha amanzi ukuhlola ukuconsa kwamanzi okungabikiwe.

src: boapelo tswala sinki fa o tlhatswa dijana, o se tlogele metsi a elela go tswa mo thepeng.
tgt: funda imitha yamanzi ngaphambi futhi ngemuva kwesikhathi esingamahora amabili, uma engekho amanzi aseke asetshenziswa.

src: dirisa sesepa se le sennye fela sa go tlhatswa dijana, gore o seka wa pateletsega go di tsokotsa.
tgt: uma imitha yamanzi ingasafani, kuchaza ukuthi kukhona lapho econsa khona.

src: tswala sinki fa o tlhatswa merogo, e seng go tlogela metsi a elela mo thepeng.
tgt: izakhamuzi ziyacelwa ukuba zilungise ompompi abaconsayo.

src: tsaya maatla a gago, bega petelelo adele schormann go nna motswasetlha belo wa tshotlakako ka thobalano kgotsa petelelo ke nngwe ya maite mogelo a a maswe a motho a ka lebaganang le ona.
tgt: buyisa amandla akho, bika ngokunukubezwa adele schormann ukuba isisulu soku nukubezwa ngoko cansi noma ukudlwengulwa kuyinto ebu hlungu nethusayo umuntu angabhekana nayo.

src: ke ka fao tirelo ya sepodisi sa aforikaborwa (saps) e dirisang tsamaiso eo e dirang gore go nne bonolo ebile go sireletsegile go batho go ka bega bosenyi jono.
tgt: ingakho umbutho wamaphoyisa waseningizimu afrika (isaps) usubeke izinhlelo zokwenza kube lula futhi kuphephe kubantu ukubika lobu bugebengu.

src: sebui sa sepodisi sa kwa mpumalanga mokolonele mtsholi bhembe o rile go botlhokwa gore baagi ba dirisane le sepodisi le go bega bosenyi jono.
tgt: okhulumela amaphoyisa ase mpumalanga ucolonel mtsholi bhembe uthe kubalulekile ukuba umphakathi usebenzisane namaphoyisa futhi ubike lobu bugebengu.

src: "rona, jaaka re le ba sepodisi, ke tiro ya rona go nna le seabe se segolo go netefatsa fa batlolamola ba tlhagelela fa pele ga kgotla le go bona batswasetlhabelo ba nna ba bolokesegile.
tgt: "njengamaphoyisa, kuwum sebenzi wethu ukudlala indi ma enkulu ukuqinisekisa uku thi ababhebhezeli bayabanjwa futhi izisulu zobugebengu zi sezandleni eziphephile.

src: re rotloetsa baagi go tlhagelela le go bega dikgetse tsa petelelo kwa diteišeneng tsa sepodise tse di gaufi le bona," o rialo bhembe.
tgt: sicela ukuba umphakathi uze ubike amacala okudlwengulwa eziteshini zamaphoyisa eziseduzane," kuqhuba ubhembe.

src: batswasetlhabelo ba tshwanetse go begela sepodisi ditiragalo tseno tsa bosenyi ba thobalano mo diureng di le 72 tsa tiragalo ya bosenyi jono.
tgt: izisulu zokunukubezwa kufanele zibike ubugebengu bezocansi emaphoyiseni engakapheli amahora angama72 kwenzeke ubugebengu.

src: bhembe o ne a eletsa batswasetlhabelo ba petelelo go bona thuso ya thitibatsomaikutlo ya morago ga go welwa ke setlhogo seno.
tgt: ubhembe uyalele izisu lu zokudlwengulwa ukuba zifune usizo lokululekwa ngemuva kwezigameko ezithusayo ezibuhlungu.

src: "o ka bona e kete o leswe mme wa batla go tlhapagangwe le gape mme e bile o ka nna ka letshogo le go tshaba go tswela kwa ntle.
tgt: "ungazizwa ungcolile futhi ugeze uphindelela futhi usabe ukuphuma.

src: ga go epe ya tsibogelo eo e e sa tlwaelegang.
tgt: akukho okungajwayelekile kulokhu futhi nokungaqhelekile.

src: o tshwanetse ka metlha o gakologelwe gore go ditirelo tse di leng gone tse di ka go thusang, " o rialo.
tgt: kufanele ukhumbule ukuthi kunosizo olutholakalayo ukukusiza," esaqhuba.

src: porojeke ya greater rape intervention (grip) ke nngwe ya ditheo tse di thusang batswasetlhabelo ba petelelo go dira diteko tsa hiv/aids le tsa malwetse mangwe.
tgt: igreater rape intervention project (igrip) enye yezinhlangano ezisiza izisulu zokudlwengulwa ukuba zihlole igciwane lesandulelangculazi (ihiv) nengculazi (iaids) nezinye izifo.

src: modirediloago wa grip thandiwe maseko a re setheo se tlhokomela batswasetlhabelo ba petelelo.
tgt: usonhlalakahle wegrip uthandiwe maseko uthe le nhlangano inakekela izisulu zokudlwengulwa.

src: "re tlamela ka sephuthelwa na sa thuso le go letla motswa setlhabelo go nna mo ntlong e e bolokesegileng go fitlha a kgona go bua.
tgt: "sihlinzekela ngokunakekela futhi sivumele izisulu zihlale endlini lapho ziqashwe khona zize zikulungele ukukhuluma.

src: re na le baritibatsamaikutlo ba ba siameng ba ba nang le tlhokomelo e bile ba nna ba le gone ka metlha go thusa," o rialo.
tgt: sinabaluleki abaphambili futhi abanakekelayo kakhulu abalindele ukukusiza," ngokusho kwakhe.

src: o bega jang kgetse ya petelelo kwa sepodising: ■ sa ntlha, o ya kwa tliliniking go tlhatlhobiwa.
tgt: libikwa kanjani emaphoyiseni icala lokudlwengulwa: ■ okokuqala, hamba uye emtholampilo ukuze uhlolwe.

src: pegelo e tla nna karolo ya kgetse mme e tla thusa sepodisi go tshwara motlolamolao.
tgt: umbiko uzoba ingxenye yefayele lecala futhi uzosiza amaphoyisa ukubamba umsolwa.

src: ■ morago o ye kwa seteišeneng se se gaufi sa sepodisi go bula kgetse.
tgt: ■ bese uya esiteshini samaphoyisa esiseduze uvule icala.

src: lepodisi le tla go botsa dipotso tse di ka ga wena le go go botsa ka se se go diragaletseng.
tgt: iphoyisa lizobuza imininingwane eqondene nawe futhi nokukwehlele.

src: araba ka dikarabo ka boammaruri mme o leke go gakologelwa dintlha tse di ntsinyana ka fa o ka kgonang.
tgt: phendula ngokuthembeka futhi uzame ukukhumbula imininingwane eminingi.

src: e ka nna tiragalo e e botlhoko, fela tshedimosetso e tla thusa sepodisi mo dipatlisisong ■ kopa dinomoro tsa mogala tsa lepodisi le le batlisisang kgetse, gore o kgone go letsa go itse se se diragalang ka kgetse.
tgt: kungaba uhlelo olubuhlungu, kodwa imininingwane izosiza uma sekwenziwa uphenyo.

src: mopitlwe 2018 kgatiso 1go ikwadisetsa ditlhopho go tla simolola ka mopitlwe 2018. more matshediso iec ya aforika borwa e goeleditse mafelo a beke a ntlha a go ikwadisetsa ditlhopho tsa 2019 mme e ro tloeditse batlhophi ba ba du meletsweng go ralala naga go etela diteišene tsa bona tsa go tlhophela go tlhabolola dintlha tsa bona mo lenaaneng la ba tlhophi kgotsa go ikwadise tsa ditlhopho.
tgt: ukubhalisela ukuvota kuzoba ngondasa wezi2018 more matshedisoi iec yaseningizimu afri ka seyimemezele impe lasonto yokuqala yokub halisela kwabavoti ukhetho lowezi2019 futhi seyinxenxe abafanele ukuvota ezweni lonke ukuthi bavakashele izikhungo zabo zokuvota ukuze balungise imininingwane yabo ohlwini lwabavoti noma ukuze babhalisele ukuvota.

src: motlhankedimogolo wa ditlhopho sy mamabolo o rile diteišene tsotlhe tsa go tlhophela di le 22612 di tla bulwa mo mafelong a beke a di 10 le di 11 tsa mopitlwe 2018 go tloga ka ura ya bo robedi mo mosong go fitlha ka ura ya botlhano maitsiboa, go dira dilo bonolo le go siamela gore batlhophi ba tlha bolole dintlha tsa bona tsa i kwadiso kgotsa ba ikwadise.
tgt: isikhulu sokhetho esiyinhloko sekhomishana usy mamabolo uthe zonke izikhungo zokuvota eziyizi22 612 zizovula ngempelasonto yangomhla ziyi10 kanye namhla ziyi11 kundasa wezi2018, kusukela ngele8 ekuseni kuze kube ngele5 ntambama, ukuze kwenziwe kube lula futhi kusize abavoti ukuthi bafake imininingwane yabo yakamuva yokubhalisa noma ukuthi ba bhalise.

src: fa ele gore o fudugetse kwa lefelong le le ntšhwa e sale ikwadiso ya gago ya go tlhopha e e fetileng, o tshwanetse go ya go ikwadisa gape mo kgaolong e ntšhwa ya go tlho phela.
tgt: uma uthuthele endaweni entsha kusukela mhla ugcina ukubha lisela ukuvota, kumele ubhalise esifundeni sakho sokuvota esisha.

src: baagi ba aforika borwa ba ba dingwaga di le 16 kgotsa go feta mme ba na le lekwa loitshupo kgotsa karataitshu po tsa semmuso ba ka ikwa disetsa go tlhopha.
tgt: izakhamuzi zaseningizimu afrika ezineminyaka yobudala eyi16 kanye nangaphezulu ezinomazisi noma ikhadi elisemthethweni zingabhalisela ukuvota.

src: fa o sa ikwa disa, o ka se letlelelwe go tlho pha ka 2019. batlhophi ba ba ikwadisi tseng bao dintlha tsa bona tsa bonno di sa tlhageleleng mo lenaaneng la batlhophi, ba ka tlamela ka tshedimosetso e e tlhokegang kwa diteišeneng tsa bona tsa go tlhopha ka nako ya go ikwa disa.
tgt: uma ungabhalisanga, angeke uze uvunyelwe ukuthi uvote ngowezi2019.

src: "re tlhoka gore batlhophi ba tlhagelele mme ba dirise tšhono e" go bua mamabolo.
tgt: "sidinga ukuthi abavoti bafike futhi basebenzise ithuba," kusho umamabolo.

src: "khomišene ya ditlhopho e santse e tlhaela diaterese tse di ka nnang dimilione di le 2.8 tsa batlhophi.
tgt: "ikhomishani yokhetho ezimele ayikabi namakheli abavoti cishe abayizigidi eziyi2.8.

src: re na le gape le dimilione di le 35 tsa diaterese tseo e leng gore di kaiwa di sa felela kgotsa di tlhagelela ga ntsi ka nako e le ngwe.
tgt: ngaphezu kwalokho sinamakheli ayizigidi eziyi3.5 abekwe kuhlu ‘lwa ngaphelele’ noma ‘angacacile’.

src: karolo eno e tlhoka tshetshereganyo go netefatsa gore a mme go na le dintlha tse dingwe tse di leng teng" a tlaleletsa.
tgt: lo mkhakha usadinga ukuhlaziywa futhi ukuze kutholakale ukuthi ngabe kukhona yini eminye imininingwane etholakalayo," kwengeza yena.

src: khomišene e dirile dipa tlisiso ka ga diaterese tse, e di risa ditsela tse di farologaneng go akaretsa tekolo ya direkoto, difaele le diakhaefe go netefatsa le go boloka diaterese tseo ba tlhophi ba tlametseng ka tso na mo dingwageng di le 20 tse di fetileng; go kgoboka nya diaterese ka nako ya di tlhopho tsa bo mmasepala tsa 2016; le go tsena ntlo le ntlo pele ga mafelo a beke ya ikwadiso tebang le go tsweletsa ditlhophotlalele tso.
tgt: ikhomishani ithola amakheli ngokusebenzisa izinhlelo ezahlukene, ezihlanganisa ukubukeza amarekhodi, amafayela kanye nezinqolobane zemibhalo ukuze ibheke bese ifaka amakheli ahlinzekwe abavoti eminyakeni engama20 edlule, ngokuqoqa amakheli ngokhetho lomasipala lowezi2016, kanye nokwenza umsebenzi wokufuna bukhoma kungekafiki impelasonto yoku bhalisela ukhetho lokuchibiyela.

src: fao go tlhokegang , ba tlhophi bao go fitlhelwang ba ikwadisitse mo mafelong a go tlhophela a a fosage tseng ba ne ba suthisiwa go ya ka karolo 1 2(i) (d) ya molao wa ditlhopho.
tgt: lapho kwakunesidingo khona, abavoti abatholakale bebhaliswe ezifundeni zokuvota ezingafanele basuswa, njengalokho kuhlinzekwe kusigaba 12 (1)(d) somthetho wokhetho.

src: "re amogetse le go dirisa, fao o tlhokegang, diaterese go tswa mo metsweding e meng we ya naga jaaka, lefapa la dipalopalo la aforika borwa,setheo sa tshireletso ya loa go sa aforika borwa, telkom, kantoroposo ya aforika borwa le lefapha la merero ya selegae" a rialo .
tgt: "sesithole futhi sasebenzisa, lapho bekwenzeka khona, imininingwane yamakheli kweminye imithombo yombuso efana nestatistics south africa, isouth african social security agency, utelkom, isouth african post office kanye nomnyango wezasekhaya," kusho yena.
