src: za) gore batlhophi ba ba ikwadisitseng mme ba na le inthanete ba lebesešwa kgotsa ba neelane ka diaterese tsa bone.
tgt: za) kubavoti ababhalisiwe abakwazi ukufinyelela kuinthanethi ukuze babukeze bese/noma bahlinzeke ngamakheli abo.

src: batlhophi ba ka letsetsa mo nomorong ya mogala ya(0800 11 8000) go tloga ka mosupologo go fitlhela ka labotlhano ka diura tsa tiro go bona thuso mabapi le mafelo a bona a diaterese tsa go tlhopha kgotsa dipotso dingwe le dingwe.
tgt: abavoti bangashayela isikhungo sokuxhumana ucingo (0800 11 8000), kusukela ngomsombuluko ukuya ngolwesihlanu ngezikhathi zomsebenzi, ukuze bathole ukulekelelwa ngezindawo okutholakala kuzo izikhungo zabo zokuvota kanye nanganoma yini enye abafisa ukuyibuza.

src: batlhophi ba ba ikwadisitseng ba ka romela nomoroitshupo ya bona ka molaetsakhutswe go 32810 gore ba amogele molaetsakhutswe o o na leng aterese ya seteišene sa bona sa go tlhopha.
tgt: abavoti ababhalisiwe bangathumela futhi ngesms inombolo yabo kamazisi ku32810 ukuze bathole isms enekheli lesikhungo sabo sokuvota (isms ibiza ur1).

src: ( ditshenyegelo tsa molaetsakhutswe ke r1)se o tlhokang go tsamaya le sonafa o etela seteišene sa gago sa go tlhophela tsaya bukanaitshupo, karataitshupo kgotsa setifikeiti sa nakwana sa boitshupo.
tgt: yini okumele uze nayouma uvakashela isikhungo sakho sokuvota hamba nomazisi wakho onamagabelo noma umazisi wesmart card noma isitifiketi sesikhashana sikamazisi.

src: o tla thusiwa go tlatsa foromo ya ikwadiso e e tlhagisang aterese ya bodulo.
tgt: uzolekelelwa ukuze ugcwalise ifomu lokubhalisa elinika imininingwane yekheli lakho lendawo.

src: boloka ditshukudu tsa rona more matshediso tona ya merero ya tikologo, edna mole wa o rebotse pegelo ya ntlha ya kgatelopele ya 2018 ka ga tsamaiso ya puso ya togamaano e e tswaragane tsweng ya go lwantsha go tsomiwa ga ditshukudu.
tgt: sindisani obhejane bakithi more matshediso ungqongqoshe wezendawo, ued na molewa, usekhi phe umbiko wokuqala wezi2018 wenqubekela phambili eseyibe khona ngokuphathelene nesu likahulumeni lokwengamela elididiyela izinhlaka eziningi lokuqeda ukuzingelwa kobhejane.

src: pegelo, eo gape e akaretsang kotara ya bofelo ya ngwaga wa 2017, e bontsha kgatelopele mo palong ya ditlhatlhelo, dipatlisiso le katlego ya go bonwa molato ga batsomi ba ditshukudu le batlodisathoto ka bokhukhuntshwane le kwelotlase e nnye ya palo ya ditshukudu tse di tsomilweng naga ka bophara ka ngwaga wa 2017(1028), fa go bapa ntshwa le ngwaga wa 2016(1054).
tgt: umbiko, ohlanganisa nekota yokugcina yowezi2017, ukhombisa inqubekela phambili ngokuphathelene nenani lababoshiwe, uphenyo kanye nabazingela bese beshushu mbisa izimpondo zobhejane asebegwetshiwe kanye nokwehla kancane kwesibalo sobhejane abazingelwa kuzwelonke ngowezi2017 (1028), uma kuqhathaniswa nowezi2016 (1054).

src: ka ngwaga wa 2017 go nnile le diphamolo di le 8 tsa dina ka tsa ditshukudu kwa boe mafofane ba or tambo mme go tlhatlhetswe babelaelwa ba batsomi ba ditshukudu ba le 502 le babelaelwa ba bagwebi ka dinaka tsa ditshukudu ba le 16, seno se tlisa palo go 518, kwelotlase go tswa go 680 ya ngwaga wa 2016.
tgt: ngowezi2017 kwaba khona ukwemukwa kwezimpondo zobhejane okuyisishiyagalo mbili esikhumulweni sezindiza ior tambo international futhi kwaboshwa abangama502 abasolwa ngokuzingela obhe jane nabayi16 abasolwa ngo kushushumbisa izimpondo zobhejane, nokwaholela ekutheni isibalo sibe ngama518, sehla sisuka kuma680 ngowezi2016.

src: "ka maswabi batlhankedi ba le 21 go tswa mo badiring ba rona ba tlhatlhetswe mabapi le ditiro tse di amanang le go tsomiwa ga ditshukudu ka 2017" go bua tona edna molewa.
tgt: "kuyadumaza ukuthi, abasebenzi bethu abangama21 baboshelwa ukuzibandaka nya nokuzingelwa kobhejane ngowezi2017," kusho ungqongqoshe umolewa.

src: se, se ama jang moruo wa nagapuso le badirisanammogo le yona e tsentse tirisong ditse la tse di farologaneng tsa go fokotsa go tsomiwa ga ditshu kudu go akaretsa manaane a go tlhola gangwe le gape ga ditsha tsa diphologolo tsa bosetšhaba ka tiriso ya theke noloji ya maemo a a kwa go dimo.
tgt: ukunqanda ukuzingelwa kobhejaneuhulumeni kanye nabambi sene nabo sebesebenzise izi ndlela ezahlukene nokunqanda ukuzingelwa kobhejane, ezi hlanganisa izinhlelo zokuqapha eziqiwini zikazwelonke kanye nokusebenzisa ubuchwe pheshe obuguqula isimo.

src: magareng ga ferikgong le sedimonthole 2017, go tsomilwe ditshukudu di le 507 kwa setsheng sa diphologolo tse di tlhaga sa kruger national park, palo eo e leng kwa tlase ka diperesente di le 24 go na le 662 ka ngwaga wa 2016.
tgt: phakathi kukamasingana kanye nozibandlela wezi2017, kwazingelwa obhejane abangama504 ekruger national park (knp), nokungamaphesenti ehle ngama24 kunama662 angowezi2016.

src: "ka ntlha ya togamaano ya rona ya go lwantsha go tsomiwa ga ditshukudu kwa knp re bona kwelotlase ya go tsoma ditshukudu mo ditsheng tsa diphologolo tse di tlhaga, ka 2662 e e rekotilweng ka 2017 fa go bapantshiwa le 2883 ka 2016. seno se bontsha kwelotlase ya diperesente di le 7.6" go tlhomamisa tona.
tgt: "ngenxa yendlela yokunqanda ukuzingelwa kobhejane eknp sibona yehla imizamo yokuzingelwa kobhejane esiqiwini, kuqoshwe izi2662 ngowezi2017 uma kuqhathaniswa nezi2883 ngowezi2016.

src: le fa gontse jalo, palo ya ditshukudu tse di tsomilweng kwa ditsheng tsa diphologolo tse di tlhaga tsa kwa kwazulu natal, kapa bokone, mpu malanga,foreisetata le bokone bophirima e ile kwa godimo.
tgt: lokhu kukhombisa ukwehla kwamaphesenti ngo7.6," kuqinisa ungqongqoshe.

src: se, se ama jang moruo wa nagago tsomiwa ga ditshukudu le go gweba ka diphologolo tsa kwa nageng go ama kgolo ya ikonomi ya naga le go tlhamiwa ga ditiro, go akaretsa kgolo ya ikonomi e e farologaneng ya tikologo eo e tsenyeletsang ya lephata la bonajanala ka tsela e e sa siamang.
tgt: noma kunjalo, sekwenyuke isibalo sobhejane abazingelwe kwazulunatali, enyakatho kapa, empumalanga, efreyi stata kanye nasesifundazweni sasenyakathontshonalanga.

src: "tatlhegelo ya aforika borwa ya nngwe ya ditshedi tsa naga tse di botlhokwa tse di jaaka tshukudu eo e leng nngwe ya diphologolo tse tlhano tse di kgolo e ka nna le ditlamorago tse di sa siamang mo palong ya bajanala ba ba etelang aforika borwa.
tgt: umthelela kwezomnothoukuzingelwa kobhejane kanye nokushushumbiswa kwezi lwane kunomthelela omubi ekuthuthukisweni komnotho wezwe kanye nasekudalweni kwamathuba omsebenzi, okuhlanganisa ukuthuthukiswa komnotho onhlobonhlobo wezemvelo ohlanganisa no mkhakha wezokuvakasha.

src: misa ke kgatisosemmuso ya mothalateropo ya katlego more matshediso go golela mo lelapeng le le ikgonereng, le ete letswepele ke mosadi yo o sa nyalwanag e bile a sa dire go ka nna le kgoreletso fela ga go a ka ga thibela vele mukhodiwa go sala morago toro ya gagwe ya go nna motha lateropo.
tgt: imisa iwuhlelo elasiza umhleli womumo wedolobha more matshediso ukukhula ekhaya eli dla imbuya ngothi eliphethwe umama ngayedwana ebe engase benzi kungawavimba ama thuba empumelelo, kodwa akuzange kumvimbe uvele mukhodiwa ekulandeleni i phupho lakhe lokuba umhleli womumo wedolobha.

src: mukhodiwa, yo o tswang kwa motseng wa luheni mo mmase paleng wa selegae wa thulame la mo limpopo, o bone gerata ya batšhelara go bothala teropo le kgaolo kwa yunibesithing ya venda ka 2016. ke mongwe wa baamogedi thuso ba lenaane la dialogane tsa bašwa tsa kemedi ya tshegetso ya mafaratlhatlha a mmasepala (misa), eo e ikaelelang go neelana ka maitemogelo le bogakolodi go tiro go diaologane tseo di ikatiseditsweng maphata a a maleba a setegeniki gore di kgone go kwadisiwa jaaka diporofešenale.
tgt: umukhodiwa, odabuka esigodini saseluheni kumasipala wasekhaya ithulame la elimpopo, uthole iziqu zeurban and regional pla nning enyuvesi yasevenda ngowezi2016.

src: misa ke karolo ya puso ya bosetšhaba mo teng ga lefapha la pusotshwaraganelo.
tgt: ungomunye wabahlomule ohlelweni lokweseka ingqa lasizinga kamasipala lwa bantu abasha abathweswe iziqu (imisa), oluhlose ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu abathweswe iziqu ezingeni lemfudo ephakeme bakwazi ukungena emsebenzini babone okwenziwayo futhi bacathuliswe emsebenzini emikhakheni yezobuchwe pheshe ukuze bakwazi uku bhaliswa njengochwepheshe.

src: e tlhamilwe ka motsheganong 2012.
tgt: yasungulwa kunhlaba 2012.

src: "morago ga go digela maremat lou ka 2008, ke ne ka ikhut sa ngwaga ke santse ke batla gore ke tlile go duelela jang dituelo tsa yunibesithi," go rialo mukhodiwa.
tgt: "emuva kokuqeda umatikuletsheni ngowezi2008, kwaba nesidingo sokuthi ngithathe ikhefu lonyaka ukuze ngithole indlela yokukhokha izindleko zasenyuvesi," ku sho umukhodiwa.

src: ka 2010, o ne a ikwadisa kwa yunibesithing ya johannesburg fela matlole a seka a mo letla go digela ngwaga wa ntlha mme a tlogela.
tgt: ngowezi2010, wabhalisa enyuvesi yasegoli kodwa akabanga nemali eyanele ukuthi aqede unyaka wakhe wokuqala, kwase kuphoqele ka ukuthi ashiye phansi.

src: ngwaga o o latelang, a ikwadisetsa khoso ya boenjenere jwa tsa motlakase n3 kwa kholetšheng ya selegae mme a lemoga gore ga a e rate.
tgt: ngonyaka olandelayo, wa bhalisela izifundo zobunjini yela, ielectrical engineering n3 ekolishi langakubo kepha washesha ukubona ukuthi bengadalelwanga lezo zifu ndo.

src: o ne gape a simolola go romela dikopo kwa diyunibesithing ka tsholofelo ya go bona dithuso ka madi.
tgt: waphinda futhi wathu mela izicelo zokufunda emanyuvesi ethemba ukuthi uzothola uxhaso.

src: ka lesego, yunibesithi ya venda ya amogela kopo ya gagwe mme a simolola go ithute la gerata ya bothala teropo le kgaolo ya gagwe ka 2012.
tgt: ngenhlanhla, inyuvesi yasevenda yasamukela isicelo sakhe, waqala ukufundela iziqu zeurban and regional planning ngowezi2012.

src: "sekema sa bosetšhaba sa thuso ya matlole go baithuti se dueletse dithuto tsa ngwaga wa ntlha mme misa ya tla ka basari fa ke dira ngwaga wa bobedi le go ntshegetsa go fitlha ke digela khoso ya me ka 2016," a rialo.
tgt: "uhlelo lokuxhasa abafu ndi ngezimali kuzwelonke (insfas) lwakhokhela izifundo zami zonyaka wokuqala, imisa yangipha umfundaze sengisonyanke ni wesibili futhi yangeseka ngaze ngaqeda izifundo zami ngowezi2016," kusho yena.

src: basari e ne e duelela ditlhoko tsa gagwe tsotlhe tsa thuto, go tsenyeletsa tuelo ya thuto, dibuka, manno le dijo.
tgt: umfundaze wahlangabezana nazo zonke izidingo zakhe zemfundo, okubandakanya imali yezifundo, izincwadi, indawo yokuhlala kanye nokudla.

src: ka 2017 mukhodiwa o ne a simolola ikatisetsotirong kwa mmasepaleng wa selegae wa prince albert mo lefapheng la dikgwebo le ditirelo tsa baagi.
tgt: ngowezi2017 umukhodiwa waqala uhlelo lokuqashwa okwesikhashana ngenhloso yokufundiswa umsebe nzi kumasipala wasekhaya iprince albert emnyangweni wezemisebenzi yokwesekwa komnyango kanye nompha kathi.

src: "ga go kitla go nna thari go fitlhelela se o se batlang mo botshelong.
tgt: "ungafinyelela lapho ofu na ukuya khona noma ku nini.

src: o tshwanetse go dira tsotlhe tse di mo matleng a gago go fetola boemo le go tokafatsa maemo a gago a botshelo," go rialo mukhodiwa.
tgt: kumele wenze konke okusemandleni ukushintsha izimo zakho futhi uthuthu kise izimo ophila ngaphansi kwazo," kusho umukhodiwa.

src: lenaane la dialogane tsa bašwa la misa le na le dialogane tsa bašwa di le 70 gajaana, go tsenyeletsa bathala teropo le kgaolo ba le 31, baenjenere ba motlakase ba le 24, baenjenere ba tsa ditsela le maborogo ba le 12 le batsamaisi ba khunyelo le porojeke ba le bararo.
tgt: uhlelo lwabantu abasha abathweswe iziqu imisa lunabathweswe iziqu abangama70, okubandaka nya abahleli bomumo wama dolobha nezifunda abanga ma31, onjiniyela obuqodene nogesi abangama24, onjiniyela abaqondene nezokudwe ba, ukwakha nokulungisa okwakhiwe abayi12 kanye nabaphathi bamaphrojekthi nezinkontileka abathathu.

src: botlhe ba mo dimmasepaleng go ralala diporofense di le robongwe jaaka karolo ya lenaane.
tgt: bonke basingethwe omasipala kuzo zonke izifundazwe eziyisishiyagalolunye nje ngengxenye yohlelo.

src: motlhankedimogolo wa namaosatshwere wa misa, ntandazo vimba, o rile kantoro ya gagwe e tlhaloganya tlhoko e e masisi ya baenjenere le dikgono go tikologo ya kago mo aforika borwa.
tgt: isikhulu esiphezulu (iceo) esiyibamba semisa unta ndazo vimba uthe ihhovisi lakhe liyaqonda ukuthi ini ngizimu afrika idinga kakhu lu abantu abanamakhono obunjiniyela nezokwakha.

src: "ga re batle fela bašwa bao ba nang le dithutego go dithupiso tseno, fela re tlhoka go netefatsa gore ba na le katiso e e lemogiwang boditšhabatšhaba le gore ke diporofešenale tse di ikwadisitseng," vimba a rialo.
tgt: "asifuni abantu abasha abaneziqu kule mikhakha kuphela, kodwa kumele siqinisekise ukuthi baqeqe shwe ngendlela esezingeni lomhlaba futhi bangochwe pheshe ababhalisiwe," kusho uvimba.

src: "dimmasepala tsa rona di tlhoka diporofešenale thatathata.
tgt: "omasipala bethu baba dinga kakhulu ochwepheshe.

src: re na le boikarabelo jo bogolo go dira pusoselegae ya porofešenale, ka maiteko a rona a go aga bokgoni," a tlaleletsa .
tgt: sinomthwalo omkhulu wo kwenza uhulumeni wase khaya ube nochwepheshe, ngokusebenzisa izinhlelo zethu zokuvukuza ama khono," esho engezela.

src: batsadi ba ya go tlhopha kwa ditlhophong tsa sgb batsadi ba na le tšhono ya go tshameka karolo ya boetapele go bolaodi jwa dikolo tsa setšhaba ka maikaelelo a go tokafatsa maemo le go dira sekolo lefelo le le botoka go bana ba bona.
tgt: abazali bazobamba iqhaza okhethweni lwesgb abazali banethuba lokubamba iqhaza lobuholi ekulawulweni kokuphathwa kwezikole zikahulumeni ngenhloso yokuthuthukisa isimo kanye nokwenza isikole sabantwana babo sibe indawo engcono.

src: ditlhopho tsa lekgotla taolo la sekolo (sgb) di tlile go tshwarwa ka mopitlwe mme batsadi ba kopiwa go tsaya karolo ka matlhagatlhaga mo thutong ya bana ba bona.
tgt: ukhetho lwesigungu esilawulwa uku phathwa kwesikole (isgb) lubanjwa kundasa futhi abazali banxuswa ukuthi bazibandakanye ukuze ba bambe iqhaza elibonakalayo emfundweni yezingane zabo.

src: ditlhopho di tlile go tshwarwa mo dikolong tsotlhe tsa setšhaba go ralala naga.
tgt: ukhetho luzobanjwa kuzo zonke izikole zikahulumeni ezweni lonkana.

src: tona ya thuto ya motheo angie motshekga o rile seno ke tsamaiso e kgolo ya ditl hopho mo nageng, kwa ntle ga ditlhopho tsa puso tsa selegae le tsa bosetšhaba.
tgt: ungqongqoshe weze mfundo eyisisekelo uangie motshekga uthe le yinqubo yokhetho enkulukazi ezweni, engaphandle kokhetho lohulumeni basekhaya kanye no hulumeni kazwelonke.

src: "ditlhopho tsa sgb di tlhagisa kutlwisiso e matla ya beng ba setšhaba.
tgt: "ukhetho lwesgb lunegale lo ekutheni umphakathi uzi zwele ingumnikazi wendawo yawo.

src: tiro ya dikolo e na le go tokafala fa batsadi ba tsaya karolo ka matlhagatlhaga le go nna le kgatlhego mo mererong ya sekolo.
tgt: imiphumela yesikole ivame ukuba ngcono lapho abazali bezibandakanya ngokugcwele futhi benentshi sekelo ezindabeni zesikole.

src: "o rile di sgb di na le karolo e kgolo e ba e tshamekang ya go lolamisa dikgatlhegelo tsa baamegi botlhe go tshegetsa maikaelelo a a tshwanang a go fitlhelela diphitlhelelo tsa thuto tse di siameng tseo di arabelang ditlhoko tsa baagi le tlhabololo ya ikonomi.
tgt: "amasgb anendima enku lu okumele ayidlale eku qinisekiseni ukuthi izidingo zabo bonke ababambiqhaza ziyahambelana, ngenhloso yokufezekisa injongo efanayo yokuzuza imiphumela yezemfundo emihle, ezo kwazi ukubhekelela izidi ngo zomphakathi kanye ne ntuthuko yezomnotho.

src: sgb ke kemedi ya maphata otlhe a baagi go tsenyeletsa batsadi, barutabana, badiri bao e seng barutabana le barutwana.
tgt: isgb imele zonke izinhla ka zomphakathi wesikole, okubandakanya abazali, othisha, abasebenzi aba ngafundisi kanye nabafu ndi.

src: nako ya kantoro go maloko a sgb ke dingwaga di le tharo.
tgt: isikhathi sokusebenza kwamalungu esgb siyimi nyaka emithathu.

src: dithata go laola dikolo molao wa dikolo wa aforika borwa o neela makgotlataolo dithata tse di bonalang go laola dikolo jaaka karolo ya dipopegokgolo tsa temokerasi.
tgt: amandla okulawula ukuphathwa kwezikole umthetho wezikole zaseningi zimu afrika unika isgb amandla alingene okulawula ukuphathwa kwezikole nje ngengxenye yezinhlaka zenta ndo yeningi labantu ezibalule kile.

src: ka go tsaya karolo go tsa maiso ya ditlhopho, batsadi ba netefatsa gore sekolo se diragatsa dikgatlhegelo tsa bana ba bona.
tgt: ngokubamba iqhaza enqu bweni yokhetho, abazali ba qinisekisa ukuthi isikole senza lokhu okuphumelelisa intshisekelo yezingane zabo ngendlela ephuma phambili.

src: le fa maloko a lekgotlataolo a sa tlhoke go nna le dithutego tsa semmuso, batsadi ka dikgono go bolepanyabuka, palotlotlo le ditirelo tsa semolao segolobogolo, le bao ba nang le kgatlhego le lerato go thuto ba gwetlhiwa go tsenela ditlhopho.
tgt: yize amalungu esgb kungadingeki ukuthi abe neziqu ze mfundo, abazali abanamakhono okugcina amabhuku, ukuba la imali kanye nemisebenzi yezomthetho kanye nalabo abanentshisekelo, nabanotha ndo lwezemfundo banxuswa ukuthi bacabange ngokungenela ukhetho.

src: baamegi bao ba latelang ba ka tlhophiwa go nna sgb: batsadi ba barutwana ba sekolo.
tgt: kungakhethwa ababambiqhaza abalandelayo ukuze bangene kusgb: abazali abanabantwana abafunda esikoleni.

src: barutabana ba sekolo.
tgt: othisha besikole.

src: maloko a badiri fa sekolong bao e seng barutabana.
tgt: abasebenzi basesikoleni abangasibo othisha.

src: barutwana ba sekolo se segolwane.
tgt: abafundi basikole samabanga aphezulu.

src: ditiro tsa lekgotla taolo ke dife?
tgt: iyini imisebenzi yesgb?

src: go swetsa ka ga pholisi ya kamogelo mo sekolo.
tgt: ukuthatha isinqumo ngenqubomgomo yokubhaliswa.

src: go swetsa ka pholisi ya puo mo sekolong.
tgt: ukuthatha isinqumo ngenqubomgomo yolimi lwesikole.

src: go swetsa gore ke ditumelo dife tsa sedumedi tseo di tla latelwang mo sekolong.
tgt: ukuthatha isinqumo ngezinqubo zenkolo okumele zilandelwe esikoleni.

src: go tlhama molaotheo le polelo ya maikaelelo.
tgt: ukwakha umthethosisekelo wesikole kanye nesitatimende somgomongqangi wesikole.

src: go tlhama thulaganyo ya maitsholo go barutwana eo e tla laolang ditsamaiso tsa kgalemo.
tgt: ukwakha umgomo wokuziphatha.

src: go keteka pharologano ka pina ya bosetšhaba, folaga, dikabo, le letshwao la setšhaba.
tgt: ihubo lesizwe, iflegi, izindodo zesizwe, isiphandla sesizwe kanye nezimpawu zezwe kugubha ukwehlukahlukana vukuzenzele unnamed ngale nyanga kunosuku olubekelwe ukugubha ukufika kwenkululeko kanye nentando yeningi la bantu kanye nokuzuzwe yibo bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika ngokuphathelene noku suka enzondweni, ukwehluka na kanye nomlando obuhlungu ukuze sakhe ikusasa lethu sonke ndawonye.

src: vukuzenzele unnamed mo kgweding eno go letsatsi le le bee tsweng thoko go ke teka go tsalwa ga kgololosego le temokerasi le diphitlhelelo tsa maaforika borwa otlhe ka go ikgatholosa letlhoo, dikga ogano le hisetori e e botlhoko go aga mmogo bokamoso jo bo tshwanang.
tgt: ivuk’uzenzele ibheka ukubaluleka kwalolu suku nokuthi luchaza ukuthini kithina bantu baseningizimu afrika.

src: vuk’uzenzele e lebelela bo tlhokwa jwa letsatsi leno le bokao jwa lona mo go rona jaaka maaforika borwa.
tgt: mhla zingama27 kumbasa ngowe1994 iningizimu afrika yaba nokhetho lokuqa la lwentando yeningi laba ntu olungacwasi ngokwebala.

src: ka la 27 moranang 1994 aforika borwa e nnile le ditlho pho tsa ntlha tsa temokerasi tse di sa kgethololeng ka bo morafe.
tgt: kwakhethwa uhulumeni omusha owawuholwa umongameli ongasekho unelson mandela.

src: go setse go fitlheletswe go le gontsi mo dingwageng tse dintsi, fela go sa le go ntsi go go sa ntseng go tlhokwa go dirwa go tokafatsa naga ya rona le go fetola matshelo a maaforika borwa otlhe.
tgt: kuningi osekuzuziwe eminya keni edlule, kodwa kuningi oku sadinga ukuthi kwenziwe ukuze kwenziwe ngcono izwe lethu futhi kuguqulwe nezimpilo zabo bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika.

src: moranang ga se kgwedi fela ya go leba kwa morago go bona kwa naga e tswang gone, mme ke nako eo aforika bo rwa e ketekang bagale ba yona ba borre le ba bomme ka go dirisa dikabo tsa bosetšhaba.
tgt: le nyanga kambasa akuyona kuphela eyokuthi sibheke ukuthi sesizuzeni njengezwe, ko dwa yisikhathi futhi lapho ini ngizimu afrika igubha khona amaqhawe kanye namaqhawekazi ayo ngokuwanikeza izi ndondo zezwe.

src: ke diabo tsa maemo a a kwa go dimo tseo naga, ka mopore sidente wa yona, e di abelang baagi ba yona le baditšhaba ba ba botlhokwa.
tgt: lokhu ukuklo nyeliswa ngezindondo okusez ingeni eliphezulu kakhulu izwe, ngomongameli walo, elikwazi ukuziklomelisa izakhamuzi zalo kanye nabahlonishwa abavela emazweni angaphandle.

src: molaotheo wa aforika borwa molaotheo o ne wa kwalwa go ya ka melawana ya kgaolo 5 ya molaotheo wa nakwana (molao 200 wa 1993) mme wa amogelwa lwa ntlha ke kokoano ya molaotheo ka la 8 motsheganong 1996. wa saenwa go nna molao ka la 10 sedimonthole 1996. matshwao a rona a bosetšhaba aforika borwa ke naga e e kge thegileng ka ntlha ya fa re kgona go keteka pharologano ya rona ka go dirisa matshwao a bosetšhaba le folaga ya bosetšhaba, pina ya bosetšhaba ya aforika borwa le letshwao la setšhaba.
tgt: umthethosisekelo waseningizimu afrika umthethosisekelo wabhalwa ngokuphathelene nesigaba 5 somthethosisekelo wesikhashana (umthetho 200 we1993) futhi wemukelwa okokuqala yisigu ngu somthethosisekelo mhla ziyi8 kunhlaba 1996. wasayinwa waba ngumthetho mhla ziyi10 kuzi bandlela 1996. izimpawu zethu zezwe iningizimu afrika ihlukile ngenxa yokuthi siyakwazi ukugubha ukwehlukahluka kwethu ngezi mpawu zezwe kanye neflegi lesi zwe, ihubo lesizwe laseningizimu afrika kanye nesiphandla sesizwe.

src: folaga ya aforika borwa ga se e e tlwalegileng.
tgt: iflegi laseningizimu afrika lihlukile.

src: moakanyetso wa yona o dirilwe ke mokwadisi wa matshwao a setšhaba wa maloba wa aforika borwa, fred brownell, mme ya dirisiwa lwa ntlha ka la 27 moranang 1994. mebala ya folaga ga e na bokao jo bo rileng mme ga go le tshwao lepe le le tshwanetseng go tsamaisiwa le mebala ya folaga.
tgt: ladizayinwa istate he rald saseningizimu afrika, ufred brownell, futhi laqalwa ukuse tshenziswa ngomhla zingama27 kumbasa we1994.

src: ‘v’ e e mo folageng e kaya tshwaragano ya dielemente tse di farologaneng tsa aforika bo rwa le go tsamaya mmogo re le seoposengwe mo tseleng e e re lebisang kwa bokamosong.
tgt: imibala yeflegi ayinancazelo ethile ngakhoke akukho ngqikithi jikelele okumele iyamaniswe nemibala yeflegi.

src: go phaphasela ga folaga fa fologa e beilwe e tsepame mo leboteng , mmala o mohibidu o tshwanetse go nna ka fa molemeng wa motho yo o e lebileng mme setsholetsi kgotsa momeno o o tsenyang mogala o le kwa godimo.
tgt: u‘v’ eflegini ukhombisa uku hlangana kwabantu abahlukene baseningizimu afrika kanye nokuthatha indlela ephambi kwethu ndawonye ngobunye.

src: mme fa e rapame, se tsholetsi sa yona se tshwane tse go nna ka fa molemeng wa motho yo o e lebileng mme mmala o mohibidu o nna kwa godimo.
tgt: ukundizisa iflegi uma iflegi limiswa liqondane nodonga, indawo ebomvu kumele ibe kwesokunxele solibukayo bese umphetho wentambo ube ngaphezulu.

src: fa folaga e beilwe gaufi kgotsa kwa morago ga sebui mo kopanong, e tshwanetse go nna mo letlhakoreng la moja la sebui.
tgt: uma limiswe lavundla, umphetho wentambo kumele ube kwesokunxele solibukayo bese u mbala obomvu uba phezulu.

src: fa e beilwe felo gongwe mo lefelong la kopano, e tshwanetse go nna mo letlhakoreng la moja la bareetsi.
tgt: uma iflegi libekwe eduze noma ngemva kwesikhulumi emhla nganweni, kumele libe kwesokudla sesikhulumi.

src: letshwao la setšhaba letshwao la setšhaba, le le itse geng jaaka emboleme ya puso, ke letshwao le le kwa godimo le le bonalang la naga.
tgt: uma libekwe kwenye indawo endaweni okuhlanganye lwe kuyo kumele libekwe kwe sokudla sezethameli.

src: letshwao la setšhaba ke karolo e e botlhokwa ya kano e kgolo.
tgt: isiphandla sezwe isiphandlwa sezwe, siphinde sazi we ngokuthi uphawu lombuso, si wuphawu lombuso olubonakalayo olusezingeni eliphezulu kakhulu.

src: setlankana se se bontshang kgatiso ya kano e kgolo mo go sona se bontsha thata e e feletseng ka se kaya fa se atlanegisitswe ke moporesidente wa aforika borwa.
tgt: isiphandla sezwe siyingxe nye esemqoka yophawu le zwe olukhulu.

src: letshwao la setšhaba le tha nkgolotswe ka letsatsi la kgolo losego ka 2000. dielemente tse di mo go lona di beilwe ka tsela e e supang tlhomamo le botlhokwa.
tgt: incwadi eno mnyatheliso wophawu olukhulu inegunya eliphelele ngoba igu nyazwe umongameli waseni ngizimu afrika.

src: go lwantsha komelelo e e kgologadi vukuzenzele unnamed jaaka komelelo e setse e fitlhile mo maemong a a diphatsa kwa kapa bokone le kwa kapa botlhaba, moo me tsi a a leng kwa matamong a masepala wa teropo kgolo ya nelson mandela bay a emeng mo maemong a 25%, ke nako ya gore maaforika borwa a tshwaragane go bo loka motswedi ono o o seng montsi e bile o le botlhokwa.
tgt: ukulwisana nesomiso esikhulu vukuzenzele unnamed njengoba isomiso se sifinyelele emazi ngeni amabi kakhulu enyakatho kapa kanye nase mpumalanga kapa, lapho amazinga amadamu kumkha ndludolobha inelson man dela bay metropolitan mu nicipality engamaphesenti angama25, sekuyisikhathi sokuba izakhamuzi zase ningizimu afrika zibumbane ukuze zonge leli gugu eliyive la kancane.

src: komelelo ke paka e e telele ya go tlhoka pula e leng se se tlholang metsi a a tlhaelang.
tgt: isomiso siyisikhathi eside lapho izimvula ziyivela kancane, okwenza kuntuleke amanzi.

src: go ya ka ngaka mathieu roualt, moporofesara yo mogo lwane kwa yunibesiting ya kapa mo lefapheng la dithuto tsa mawatle, setlhodi se segolo sa komelelo ke seabe sa el niño mmogo le phetogo ya maemo a loapi.
tgt: ngokusho kukadkt mathieu roualt, ongusolwazi enyuvesi yasekapa emnyangweni wezi fundo eziphathelene nolwandle ioceanography, uthi okuyiyona mbangela yesomiso wumthelela weel niño nokuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu.

src: "el niño ke selo sa tlhago se se itlelang ka dipaka tse di rileng mme e iponagatsa gangwe le gape morago ga dingwaga di ka nna tharo go isa go di le tlhano mme e ka nna sebaka sa dingwa ga di ka nna pedi e sa tsamaye.
tgt: "iel niño yisikhathi esizifike la ngokwemvelo njalo emva kweminyaka emithathu kuya kwemihlanu, futhi singaqhube ka kuze kuphele iminyaka emi bili.

src: e oketsa maemo a mogote kwa lewatleng la pacific le la india, mme seno se ka tlhola komelelo e e seng kana ka sepe," o tlha lositse jalo.
tgt: sinyusa amazinga okushisa nokubanda olwandle ipacific neindian, okuyinto engadala isomiso," ngokusho kwakhe.

src: phetogo ya maemo a loapi e tlhalosiwa gore ke phetogo mo setlwaeding sa loaping mo le fatsheng ka bophara kgotsa mo kgaolong mme e simolotseng mo gare go fitlha kwa bokhu tlhong jwa ngwagakgolo wa bo 20 ebile e tlhotlhelediwa bogolose golo ke maemo a a tlhatlogileng a khabonotaeokosaete ya lefaufau e e tswang mo tirisong ya ditu kisi tsa fosele.
tgt: ukuguquguquka kwesimo se zulu kuchazwa njengoshintsho esimweni sezulu somhlaba jike lele noma ezifundeni, okwaqala maphakathi nenyakakhulu lama20 kuya ngasekupheleni kwalo futhi lokhu kungumphu mela wokuphakama kwamazi nga esikhutha emkhathini okubangelwa wukusetshenzi swa kwezibaseli.

src: "mo ngwagakgolong yo o fetileng dinaga tsa borwa jwa aforika di ntse di boga ka ntlha ya diphetogo tsa ngwaga le ngwaga mo phetogong ya loapi, e leng se se tlhodileng komelelo e e kgologadi le kgoreletsego mo di tsheding tsa kwa ma watleng le mo tikolo gong.
tgt: "kuleli nyakakhulu eledlule isifunda esiseningizimu ne afrika sikhahlanyezwe wukuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu unyaka nonyaka, okuholele eso misweni esinamandla esesiphazamise impilo yezinto eziphila emhla beni nasolwandle kanye nempilo yabantu.

src: diphetogo tseno di ama intaseteri ya temothuo, metsi a a beetsweng motsi wa lešekere le dikgwebo tsa bodirelatlhapi mmogo le ikonomi ka kakaretso.
tgt: lolu guquko lunomthelela ongemuhle kwezolimo, imithombo yamanzi nakwezokudoba futhi kanjalo nasemnothweni wonkana.

src: gape di ama le kelelo ya metsi mo melatswaneng le mo ditshi ngwaneng mmogo le go šwa ga dikotla mo lewatleng," ngaka roualt o tlhalositse jalo.
tgt: kuphinde kube nomthelela ongemuhle ekugelezeni kwemifudlana nezakhimpilo ezingena olwa ndle," kuchaza udkt roualt.

src: diphetogo tseno di utlwiwa bogolosegolo ke aforika borwa ka ntlha ya fa naga ya rona e setse e ntse e na le pula e e seng kalo e e ka lekanang dimililitara (ml) di le 450 ka ngwaga, fa e bapisi wa le eo dinaga tse dingwe ka bophara di itemogelang yona e e leng kanaka 860ml.
tgt: lo mthelela uzwela kakhulu eningizimu afrika ngoba izwe lethu libhekene nokuntuleka kwezimvula, esezehle nga mamililitha (ml) angama450 ngonyaka, uma kuqhathaniswa nesilinganiso somhlaba esinga ma860 ml.

src: ditlamorago tsa komelelo ke eng?
tgt: uyini umthelela wesomiso?

src: ka tlhakole, lefapha la puso tshwaraganelo le merero ya setso (cogta) le tlositse komelelo mo maemong ao e neng e beilwe mo go ona a matlhotlhapelo a porofense mme la a baya mo maemong a bosetšhaba.
tgt: ngonhlolanja, umnyango we zokusebenzisana kohulumeni kanye nezindaba zendabuko (icogta) ukhuphule izinga lenhlekelele yesomiso lisuka kwelenhlekelele yesifundazwe walibeka ezingeni lenhlekelele kazwelonke.

src: "morago ga go lekolasešwa bogolo le bogale jwa komelelo e e tsweletseng ga jaana mo diporofenseng di ka nna tharo, botsamaisi jwa ditiragalo tsa matlhotlhapelo bo ne jwa sutisa le go baya sešwa komelelo go nna matlhotlhapelo a bosetšha ba," ga rialo tlhogo ya tikwati kwe ya ditirelo tsa botsamaisi jwa ditiragalo tsa matlhotlhape lo, ngaka mmaphaka tau.
tgt: "ngemuva kokucubungula kabusha izinga nobukhulu balesi somiso esiqhubekayo esesihlasele okungenani izifu ndazwe ezintathu, abenga mele izinhlekelele babeke lesi somiso esigabeni senhlekelele kazwelonke," ngokusho kwenhloko yesikhungo esengamele izinhlekelele zikazwelonke, udkt mmaphaka tau.

src: le fa ditlamorago tsa ikonomi tse di bakiwang ke komelelo go le bokete go ka di nopola, go nnile le ditlamorago tse di boitshegang mo lekaleng la temothuo.
tgt: nakuba kusenzima uku wukala umthelela wesomiso kwezomnotho, sekube nomkhu lu umthelela emkhakheni wezolimo.

src: kwa kapa bophirima, e leng porofense ya bobedi mo nageng mo go tsenyeng letsogo mo seelong sotlhe sa ditlhagisiwa tsa naga mo ngwageng (gdp) sa temothuo, go nnile le ditiro di ka nna 21 000 tse di latlhegileng ngogola mo kotareng ya boraro.
tgt: entshonalanga kapa, okuyisifundazwe sesibili ngobukhulu esifaka isandla emkhiqizweni ophelele wezwe ohlangothini lwezolimo, ilinga niselwa ezi21 000 imisebenzi elahlekile ngekota yesithathu yonyaka odlule.

src: gauteng e nolofatsa tiriso ya dipalangwa tsa botlhe vukuzenzele unnamed lefapha la ditsela le dipalangwa la gauteng le thankgolo tse app ya megala ya ka fa potleng, gauteng on the move, tebang le thulaga nyo ya yona ya dipalangwa tsa botlhe e e kgontshang bapala mi go golagana le dipalangwa tse di farologaneng bonolo.
tgt: iapp yezokuthutha egauteng vukuzenzele unnamed umnyango wezemi gwaqo nezoku thutha egauteng usuqale uhlelokusebenza lwezokuthutha, olubizwa ngegauteng on the move, ohlelweni lwawo lokuthutha umphakathi olusiza umpha kathi ukuxhumana nezinhlobo zokuthutha ezihlukahlukene, ngaphandle kwezihibe.

src: gauteng on the move e tla fe disa ketsaetsego ya go dirisa dipalangwa tsa botlhe, ka ntlha ya fa e tla bo e tlamela bapalami ka tshedimosetso e e leng mo dinakong, lenaane la dipalangwa le dituelelo tsa gautrain‚ metrobus‚ a re yeng‚ rea vaya‚ metrorail‚ gautrain bus services‚ johannesburg city sightseeing bus‚ tshwane bus services mmogo le tsa ditirelo tsa dithekesi.
tgt: igauteng on the move wu hlelo oluqeda ungabazane nokudideka okuhambisana nokusetshenziswa kwezithuthi zomphakathi, njengoba luni keza umphakathi imininingwa ne eqondile futhi esheshayo mayelana nezikhathi zokuha mba kwezithuthi zomphakathi kanye nezindleko zegautrain, metrobus, a re yeng, rea vaya, metrorail, amabhasi egautrain, amabhasi ejohannesburg city sightseeing, amabhasi kama sipala wasetshwane kanye namatekisi.

src: fa a ne a bua kwa thankgo lolong ya app eno kwa dika ntorong tsa batlhagisi ba app eno kwa midrand mo malobeng, mokhuduthamaga wa dipalangwa tsa gauteng ismail vadi o rile lefapha le bone botlhokwa jwa thekenoloji le thulaganyo e e tlhalefileng ya dipalangwa jaaka seabe sa go tokafatsa thulaganyo ya dipalangwa.
tgt: ekhuluma ngesikhathi kwe thulwa lolu hlelokusebenza emahhovisi abasunguli balo emidrand, umec wezoku thutha egauteng uismail vadi uthe umnyango uyasibona isidingo sezobuchwepheshe no hlelo oluphusile kwezokuthutha oluzobamba iqhaza ekuthuthu kisweni kohlelo lwezokuthutha.

src: "puso ya porofense ya gauteng e beeleditse nako, matsapa a yona le didirisiwa go tokafatsa leeto leno la togomaano le le kgontsha ng banamedi go golagana bonolo le dipalangwa tse dingwe tse dikgolo mo porofenseng.
tgt: "uhulumeni wesifunda zwe sasegauteng unikele ngesikhathi, imizamo nezi nsiza ukuthuthukisa lolu hlelo lwezokuthutha olusiza umpha kathi ukwazi ukuxhumana kalula nezinhlobo zokuthu thwa komphakathi ezahlukene esifundazweni.

src: "re setse re simolotse go itemogela maatla a boitshi mololedi jwa thekenoloji moo bo rulaganyang sešwa ditirelo tsa dipalangwa tsa botlhe.
tgt: ""sesiqalile ukubona amandla ezobuchwepheshe eguqula isimo sezinsizakalo zokuthu thwa komphakathi.

src: ga re na pelaelo ya gore diphetogo tsa thekenoloji mo lefatsheng di setse di simolotse go tlisa diphetogo mo lekaleng la dipalangwa, mme re tshwanetse go rwala morwalo wa rona re gatele pele ka diphetogo tseno," o buile jalo.
tgt: akukho ukungabaza ukuthi ushintsho lwezobuchwepheshe emhlabe ni jikelele seluqalise uguquko olukhulukazi emkhakheni we zokuthutha, futhi nathi kumele siguquke ukuze sihambisane nalezi zinguquko," kusho yena.

src: vadi o totobaditse gore porofense e tla tswelela pele go dirisa boitshimololedi, boba tlisisi le tlhabololo go tsholetsa porofense e e dirisang thekenolo ji go tokafatsa tolamo le phitlhelesego ya ditirelo tsa dipalangwa.
tgt: uvadi uqinisekisile ukuthi isifundazwe sizoqhubeka noku sebenzisa ezobuchwepheshe besimanjemanje, ucwaningo nentuthuko ukuthuthukisa isifundazwe esisebenzisa ezobu chwepheshe esizophucula futhi senze kube lula ukufinyelela kwezokuthutha.

src: gang fa e setse e tsentswe mo mogaleng wa ka fa potleng, app eno e kgontsha badirisi go rulaga nya maeto a bona ka go tlhopha senamelwa se ba se batlang, dinako tse ba tla tsayang maeto ka tsone le tse dingwe, tse di jaaka maeto a makhutshwane le a a seng tlhwatlhwa godimo.
tgt: uma ‘seludawunilodiwe’ lolu hlelokusebenza, luzobasiza abalusebenzisayo ukuhlela uhambo lwabo ngokuthi bakhethe uhlobo lwezoku thutha abaludingayo, izikhathi zokuhamba nokunye, njengo kuqoka uhambo olufushane nolusheshayo futhi olungambi eqolo.

src: moithuti wa kwa yunibesiti ya johannesburg yo gape e leng monamedi glen dlamini a re app eno e tla theosa matshwafo a bapalami ba le diketekete.
tgt: umfundi wasegoli uglen dlamini uthe lolu hlelokuse benza luzoletha isisombululo kubagibeli abayizinkulungwane ngezinkulungwane.

src: "e tota e le app e e gagamatsang.
tgt: "lolu wuhlelokusebe nza olumangazayo impela.

src: bašwa ba re yes ka ga diphatlhatiro vukuzenzele unnamed masego temane o itumeletse go kokoanya mai temogelo a tiro, a a tsamaela nang le tipoloma ya gagwe ya human resource ma nagement , jaaka e le karolo ya ditirelo tsa go thapiwa ga bašwa (yes).
tgt: intsha iyalisekela uhlelo lweyes vukuzenzele unnamed umasego temane une ntokozo enkulu yo kuthola isipiliyoni somsebenzi, esihambela na neziqu zakhe zediplo ma yehuman resource ma nagement, njengombambi qhaza ohlelweni lokuqa shwa kwentsha (iyes).

src: yes, e mo malobeng e thankgolotsweng ke moporesitente cyril rama phosa, maitlhomo a yona ke go baakanyetsa bašwa diti ro le go ba tlamela ka bo kgoni jwa setegeniki jo bo tlhokegang go ka lopana le ikonomi e e itshetlegileng ka diintaseteri.
tgt: iyes, esanda kwethulwa ngumongameli cyril rama phosa, ihlose ukulungiselela abantu abasha umsebenzi kanye nokubahlinzeka nga makhono emicikilisho edinge kayo ukuze kwakhiwe umno tho othuthukisa izimboni.

src: temane o tlhalosa gore morago ga go aloga ka 2016 o ne a retelelwa ke go dira dikopo tsa ditiro ka ntlha ya fa a ne a sena maitemogelo a a matshwanedi.
tgt: utemane uyachaza ukuthi emva kokuphothula iziqu zakhe ngowezi2016 akakwa zanga ukufaka izicelo zomse benzi ngoba wayengenaso isi piliyoni somsebenzi esifanele.

src: "go ne go le bokete e le ruri go batlana le tiro ntle le maitemogelo.
tgt: "kwakulukhuni kakhulu ukufuna umsebenzi ngapha ndle kwesipiliyoni.

src: ka lesego ke ne ka kopana le ba lu laway recruitment agency ba ba dirisanang le ba yes mme ba ne ba nnaya tšhono ya borutelatiro.
tgt: nge nhlanhla ngenkathi ngi hlangana nabakwalulaway recruitment agency abase benzisana nohlelo lweyes, banginikeza ithuba lokuthola isipiliyoni emsebenzini.

src: "yes ke letsholo le le ko panetsweng ke puso, me kgatlho ya badiri le di kgwebo go ka neela milione o le mongwe wa bašwa ba naga eno maitemogelo a tiro ba ntse ba duelelwa mo tsa maong ya dingwaga di ka feta di le tharo tse di tlang.
tgt: "uhlelo lweyes umzamo ohlanganyelwe kahulumeni, abasebenzi kanye nabama bhizinisi ukuze bahlinze ke ngamathuba esipiliyoni somsebenzi akhokhelwayo entsheni yaseningizimu afrika eyisigidi kulesi sikha thi seminyaka emithathu ezayo.

src: dipatlisiso tse di tserweng ke bannaleseabe di supa gore ngwaga o le mongwe fela wa maitemogelo a tiro mo lekwalong la go batla tiro, mmogo le lekwalo la bao ba nang le kgatlhege lo ya go go ema nokeng, di oketsa ditšhono tsa mošwa tsa go ka iponela tiro ka makgetlho a le tharo.
tgt: ucwaningo oluqhutshiwe ngababambiqhaza luveza ukuthi unyaka nje owodwa wesipiliyoni somsebenzi kucv , nencwadi ewubufakazi ngamakhono nolwazi lomu ntu (ireference letter), kwenyu sa amathuba okuthola komu ntu umsebenzi ngokuphindwe kathathu.

src: temane o tlaleleditse ka gore o rata tiro ya gagwe e le ruri, bogolosegolo ka ntlha ya gore le ene o thu sa bašwa ba bangwe go ka bona ditšhono tsa ditiro jaa ka a dira jaaka mothapi wa nakwana.
tgt: utemane wengeze ngoku thi uyawuthanda umsebenzi wakhe, ikakhulukazi ngoba uphinde athole ithuba loku siza abantu abasha ukuze bathole imisebenzi njengo ba phela enza umsebenzi njengemfundamakhwela eqa sha abantu.

src: mo nakong ya fa go ne go thankgololwa yes mopore sitente ramaphosa o ne a bontshiwa bašwa ba ka nna 100 ba ba tla thapiwang mo lenaaneng leno ke absa, investec, netcare, sasol le unilever.
tgt: ekwethulweni kohlelo lweyes umongameli ramapho sa waboniswa abantu abasha bokuqala abayi100 abazoqa shwa ngalolu hlelo ngaba kwaabsa, investec, netcare, sasol nabakwaunilever.

src: "re bona letsholo leno jaaka pilara e le nngwe ya matsapa a matona a a gola ganeng le naga a go tlhole la bašwa ditšhono.
tgt: "sibona leli cebo njenge nsika eyodwa ewumzamo ka zwelonke obanzi nodidiyelwe ukuze kudalwe amathuba kubantu abasha.

src: pilara e nngwe e e botlhokwa ke go tlhagisa bokgoni jwa ba šwa," ga rialo moporesitente ramaphosa.
tgt: enye insi ka ukuthuthukiswa kwama khono nolwazi lwabantu abasha," kusho umongameli ramaphosa.

src: o ikuetse mo dikgwe bopotlaneng go tshameka karolo ya tsona ka ntlha ya fa di na le ditšhono tsa di phatlhatiro di le dintsi mme o ne a bua gape gore dikgwe bo tse dikgolo ga di kitla di kgona go ka thapa bašwa ba ba lekaneng di le nosi.
tgt: ucele abamabhizinisi ase mancane ukuba nabo badlale eyabo indima njengoba bena bantu abaningi ababaqashayo waphinde wathi amabhizinisi amakhulu akakwazi ukumu matha intsha eyanele wodwa.

src: go ya ka mokaedikhudu thamagamogolo (ceo) wa yes tashmia ismailsavi lle, mo baaging ba le 15.5 milione ba aforika bo rwa ba ba magareng ga di ngwaga di le 18 le 34, ba le 5.8 milione ba bone ga ba dire.
tgt: ngokusho kwesikhulu esi phethe (iceo) iyes uta shmia ismailsaville, phaka thi kwabantu abayizigidi ezi li15.5 eningizimu afrika abaneminyaka ephakathi kwe yi18 nengama34, abayizigidi eziyi5.8 abasebenzi.

src: "yes e ikaelela go naya palo eo ya bašwa ba rona, bao bontsi jwa bona bo tlhaelediwang matlho ke motlolo wa ga jaana wa go thapa wa mo nageng, tšhono e e botlhokwa ya ntlha ya go ka iponela maitemogelo a a boleng a tiro moo ba tla bong ba duelelwa," ga rialo ismailsaville.
tgt: "uhlelo lweyes luhlose ukunikeza leyo ngxenye ya bantu abasha baleli, abanga nakwa kakhulu yimigomo yamanje yokuqasha ezweni, ithuba lokuqala elibalulekile lokuzuza isipiliyoni somse benzi weqophelo eliphezulu, okhokhelwayo," kusho ui smailsaville.

src: jaaka morokotso wa tlale letso mo dikgwebopo tlaneng, tseo di thapang bašwa ba bathobatsho ba ba magareng ga dingwaga di le 18 le di le 29, di tla rokotsiwa ka go morokotso wa phoko letsolekgetho la go thapa o o ka nnang bokanaka ka r1 000 ka kgwedi.
tgt: umhuhiso owengeziwe kwabamabhizinisi asemanca ne, labo abaqasha abantu abasha abaneminyaka yobu dala ephakathi kweyi18 kuya kwengama29, bazofaneleka izaphulelo zentela zokuqa sha ezilingana ner1 000 nge nyanga.

src: bašwa ba yes ba tshwane tse go bo ba le: magareng ga dingwaga di le 18 le 34. mo sebakeng sa di kgwedi di feta di le thataro ba sa dire.
tgt: abantu abasha bohlelo lweyes kufanele babe: neminyaka yobudala ephakathi kweyi18nengama34.

src: go rerwa puo e ntšhwa mo nageng ya aforika borwa neo semono go na le kgonagalo ya gore khelobedu e ka nna puo ya bo 12 ya maaforika borwa go tsamaisana le go busetsa seriti sa dikgosi.
tgt: iningizimu afrika kungenzeka ibe nolimi olusemthethweni olusha neo semono ikhelobedu ingaphe nduka ulimi lwe12 olusemthethweni eni ngizimu afrika ngokuha mbisana nohlelo lokubuyise la isithunzi sabaholi benda buko.

src: moporesitente cyril rama phosa o tsibogetse seno mo nakong ya moletlo wa go tlhomiwa mo bogosing wa kgosigadi ya balobedu kwa lebaleng la metshameko la mokwakwaila kwa bo lobedu, gamodjadji kwa limpopo.
tgt: umongameli cyril rama phosa wenze lesi simemezelo ngesikhathi sokugcotshwa kwendlovukazi yesizwe sabalobedu enkundleni yezemidlalo imokwakwai la ebolobedu, egamodjadji elimpopo.

src: khelobedu ke puo e e buiwang ke morafe wa balobedu oo kgosigadi ya bona ya pula ya balobedu e e tlhophilweng e ga jaanong e santseng e na le dingwaga di le 13, masalanabo modjadji, e tla ba busang fa a sena go tshwara dingwaga di le 18, morago ga gore a tlhomiwe jaaka queen modjadji vii.
tgt: ikhelobedu ulimi olukhu lunywa uhlanga lwaba lobedu indlovukazi yemvula yabalobedu ene minyaka eyi13, umasalana bo modjadji, ezobabusa lapho isineminyaka eyi18, emva kokubekwa njengendlo vukazi modjadji wesivii.

src: o tla aroga go latela mee tlo le setso sa balobedu.
tgt: uzothweswa iziqu nje ngokwezinqubo namasiko abalobedu.

src: "eno ke kgato e e botlhokwa ya hisetori eo mama winnie madikizelamandela a neng a tla ipela ka yona.
tgt: "le yinqubekelapha mbili eyingqophamlando wangempela umama wi nnie madikizelamandela obengaziqhenya ngawo.

src: bogosi gadi jono ke jone jwa ntlha e bile ke jone fela mo nageng le mo kontinenteng jo ga jaanong bo leng teng," ga rialo moporesitente rama phosa.
tgt: lesi yisihlalo sendlovuka zi sokuqala nokuwukuphela kwaso ezweni nasezwenika zi lonkana," kusho umonga meli ramaphosa.

src: moporesitente ramaphosa o gateletse maikemisetso a puso a go tsosolosa tlotlo le seriti sa bogosi.
tgt: umongameli ramaphosa uphinde waqinisekisa uku zibophezela kukahulumeni ekubuyiselweni kwesithu nzi nenhlonipho kubaholi bendabuko.

src: bogosigadi jwa balobedu bo tseetswe tlhogong semmu so ka mopitlwe 2016 mo rago ga gore khomišene e e ka ga dikgogakgogano le ditopotuelo tsa bogosi (ctldc) e dire dipatlisi so ka ga seemo sa morafe wa balobedu, go ya ka ditopotuelo tse di tlha tlhetsweng kwa ga ctldc.
tgt: isihlalo sendlovukazi ya balobedu saqala ukwaziwa ngokusemthethweni ngonda sa wezi2016 emva kokuba ikhomishani yezicelo nezi ngxabano zobuholi benda buko (ictldc) iqhube ucwaningo odabeni lwaba lobedu, njengokwezicelo ezalethwa phambi kwect ldc.

src: "puso e ikaeletse go dirisa kgaolo ya bo 12 ya molao theo, bogolosegolo go tso solosa seriti sa setheo sa bogosi mo dinakong tsa ga jaanong tsa temokera si ya molaotheo," ga rialo moporesitente ramaphosa.
tgt: "uhulumeni uzibophezele ekuphumeleliseni imibande la yesahluko 12 somthetho sisekelo, ikakhulukazi ukubuyiselwa kwesithu nzi sobuholi bendabu ko bonkana entandweni yeningi labantu ehambisana nomthethosisekelo," kusho umongameli ramaphosa.

src: o rile go tseela tlhogo ng bogosigadi jono mo nageng ya rona ya aforika borwa go supa boineelo jwa rona mo maitsholong le mo metheong e e ka ga tekatekano ya bong, fa mo letlhakoreng le lengwe re ntse re etse tlhoko boe teledipele joo basadi ba bo diragatsang mo dikarolong tse tsotlhe tsa botshelo.
tgt: uthe ukwaziswa kwesi hlalo sezindlovukazi eni ngizimu afrika kukho mbisa ukuzibopheze la emgomweni nokwa ziswa kokuphathwa ngokulingana kobulili bonke, ngale nkathi kube kwaziswa nendima yobu holi edlalwa ngabesifazane kuzo zonke izingxenye ze mpilo.

src: "dikgosi di na le seabe se se botlhokwa thata mo go tlhomeng setšhaba se se senang lehuma, botlhokatiro le tlhokotekatekano.
tgt: "abaholi bendabuko banendima ebalulekile okufanele bayidlale uku ze kwakhiwe izwe eli ngenabubha, ukuntuleka kwemisebenzi nokuphathwa kwabantu ngokulinganayo.

src: dikgo si tsa rona di tshwanetse go di gapa kwa pele mo kgara tlhong ya go tsosolosa di tshwanelo le seriti sa batho ba borona.
tgt: abaholi bethu bendabuko badinga ukuba phambili kulo mzabalazo wokubu yisela amalungelo nesithu nzi kubantu bethu.

src: "o gateletse gape le seabe segolo se se tshamekiwang ke magosi a rona mo go bu setseng mafatshe kwa beng ba bona ba ba matshwane di.
tgt: "uqhubeke wagcizelela ukubaluleka kwendima e dlalwa ngabaholi bendabu ko ekubuyiseleni umhlaba kubanikazi abafanele.

src: "ba tshwanetse go netefa tsa gore naga e busediwa bao ba dirang mo go yona le gore bao naga e busedi wang mo go bona ba na le ditlogo tsa go ka dira mo go yona," ga rialo mopore sitente ramaphosa.
tgt: "badinga ukuqinisekisa ukuthi umhlaba ubuyise lwa kulabo abawuse benzayo kanye nokuthi labo umhlaba obuyise lwe kubona banezindlela zokuwusebenza," kusho umongameli ramaphosa.

src: batho ba ka nna dimilione di le 25 ba ba nnang kwa me tseselegaeng ba tlhaloga nya sentle boeteledipele jwa magosi.
tgt: balinganiselwa ezigidini ezingama25 abantu abahla la ezindaweni zasemakhaya ababuswa ngabaholi benda buko.

src: aforika borwa e na le maikarabelo a go tsenya bašwa sekolo more matshediso tona ya lefapha la thu to e kgolwane le kati so naledi pandor a re aforika borwa e na le bokgoni jwa go tlamela ka dibasari bana ba ba tswang mo malapeng a a humanegileng le ba ba tswang mo malapeng ao a iponelang letseno le le kwa tlase go bona thuto mo diyunibesiting le mo dikholejeng tsa thuto le kati so ya tiro ya matsogo le ya setegeniki (tvet) ka 2018. tona pandor o rile ke maikara belo a naga go tshegetsa bahuma negi mmogo le malapa ao a leng mo tlalelong go gaisa.
tgt: isibophezelo seningizimu afrika sokufundisa intsha more matshediso ungqongqoshe we mfundo ephakeme nokuqeqesha una ledi pandor uthi iningizimu afrika izokwazi ukuba nemi fundaze yezingane eziphuma emakhaya ampofu kanye nalawo anabondli abenza imisebenzi eholela amaholo aphansi ezingena enyuvesi kanye nakumakolishi oku funda indlela yokwenza nokuqeqeshelwa ukusebe nza (amatvet) ngowe zi2018.

src: o buile seno mo kopanong ya bobegakgang mo a neng a rebo la lenane la tsamaiso ya thuto e kgolwane e e sa duelelweng mo aforika borwa.
tgt: ungqongqoshe upandor uthe kuyisibophezelo sezwe ukweseka imindeni empofu kanye nesengcupheni kakhulu.

src: tona pandor o tsibositse se mmuso gore puso e beeleditse madi a mangwe gape a le kana ka r7.166 bilione go tlamela ka dibasari go bana ba ba tswang mo malapeng a a humanegileng le ba ba tswang mo malapeng ao a amogelang letseno le le kwa tlase go ya diyunibesiting le dikhole jeng tsa tvet monongwaga.
tgt: wayekhuluma ngesikhathi sesithangami sabezindaba lapho aveza khona inqubo yo kwethula imfundo ephakeme yamahhala eningizimu afrika.

src: tona pandor o tlhomamisitse gore go beetswe kwa thoko r4.581 bilione go isa sekolong baithuti ba ba falotseng go ya diyunibesiti mme r2.585 bilione e beetswe baithuti ba ba yang dikholejeng tsa tvet.
tgt: ungqongqoshe upandor ume mezela ukuthi uhulumeni usetshale izigidi zezigidi zamara ndi eziyi7.

src: ka ngwaga wa 2017 puso e begile gore thuto e kgolwane e tla nna mahala go baithuti ba ba dikobo dikhutshwane le ba ba tswang mo malapeng a a amo gelang letseno le le kwa tlase ga r350 000 ka ngwaga.
tgt: 166 ukuze ukho khele imifundaze yezingane ezivela emindenini empofu kanye nezasemindenini ena bondli abenza imisebenzi eholela amaholo aphansi ezi ngena emanyuvesi kanye naku makolishi etvet kulo nyaka.

src: baithuti ba tla tshegediwa go tswa mo sekemeng se se atolosi tsweng sa dibasari, seo se tsenang mo legatong la sekema sa mo malobeng sa kadimo le bontlha bongwe jwa dibasari seo se neng se neelwa ke sekema sa bosetšha ba sa thuso ya ditšhelete tsa thuto mo baithuting (nsfas).
tgt: ungqongqoshe upandor uqinisekisile ukuthi sekubekwe eceleni izigidi zezigidi zamara ndi ezingama4.581 kwenzelwa izitshudeni ezikwaze ukungena emanyuvesi kanye nezigidi zezigidi zamarandi eziyi2.585 zezitshudeni zakumakolishi etvet.

src: "motheo wa madi a a abelwang nsfas go tshegetsa baithuti ba diyunibesiti le dikholeje tsa tvet ba ba humanegileng le bao ba tswang mo malapeng a a amogelang letseno le le kwa tlase a tla okediwa go tloga go r9.849 bilione ka ngwaga wa 2017/18 go ya go r35.321 bilione ka ngwaga wa 2020/21.
tgt: ngowezi2017 uhulumeni wamemezela ukuthi imfundo ephakeme izoba mahhala kuzi tshudeni ezimpofu kanye na lezo ezivela emindenini ethola umholo wonyaka ohlangene ngaphambi kwezimali eziba njwayo engaze ifinyelele kwi zi350 000 zamarandi.

src: seno se tlhalosa tlhokego ya thulaganyo e e tokafaditsweng e bile e dira sentle mo tsamaisong ya nsfas.
tgt: izitshudeni zesekwa ngesi kimu semifundaze esibanzi, esingena esikhundleni sesi kimu esedlule esasinengxenye eyimalimboleko kanye nengu mfundaze esasihlinzekwa isi khwama sikwazwelonke sokusiza abafundi ngezimali (insfas).

src: ka jalo re abelane ka madi a mangwe gape a le kana ka r105 milione mo pakeng ya letlhomeso la ditshenyegelo tsa pakagare (mtef) go thusa nsfas go oketsa le go matlafatsa mothamo wa thulaganyotsamai so ya yona," go rialo tona.
tgt: "ukuhlinzekwa okusisekelo kwensfas kokuxhasa izitshudeni ezivela emindenini empofu kanye naleyo ihola amaholo aphansi ezingena emanyuvesi kanye nakumako lishi etvet kuzokhuphuka ku suka ezigidini zezigidi zamara ndi eziyi9.849 ngowe zi2017/18 ukuya ezigidini zezigidi zamarandi ezinga ma35.321 ngowezi2020/21.

src: baithuti ba ba falotseng, mo dingwageng tsotlhe tsa fa ba tla bo ba ithuta, ba ba ikwadiseditse ng makwalo a bosetšhaba (thuto ya ditiro tsa diatla) le manane a thuto mo dikholejeng mo dikho lejeng tsa botlhe tsa tvet ba tla amogela dibasari tsa go duelela dithuto le didirisiwa tsa go ithuta.
tgt: "lokhu kuchaza isidingo zokwenza ngcono ukwenziwa komsebenzi kanye noku thuthukisa izinhlelo zensfas.

src: lefapha la merero ya selegae le lwantsha mela more matshediso lefapha la merero ya selegae le tsenya mo tirisong leanotiro la go netefatsa fa baagi ba sa senyegelwe ke nako mo me leng.
tgt: umnyango wezasekhaya umemezela ukulwisana nemigqa emide more matshediso umnyango wezase khaya ulungiselela uhlelo lokuqinisekisa ukuthi izakhamuzi azichithi isikhathi eside emigqeni.

src: go ya ka tona ya merero ya selegae malusi gigaba mela e meleele e ne e tlholwa ke thologelo e e kwa godimo ya baagi, dikantorobogorogelo tse dinnye, matsapa a boeteledipele le go tswalwa ga dikantoro ka bo lamatlhatso.
tgt: ngokukangqongqoshe wo mnyango wezasekhaya umalusi gigaba imigqa emide ibibangelwa inani eliphezulu labantu abadinga usizo, isikhala esinganele ema hhovisi omnyango, izinkinga eziphathelene nobuholi kanye nokuvalwa kwamahhovisi awo ngemigqibelo.

src: go baakanya mathata a, lefapha le dirile dipatlisiso labo la tsaya tshwetso ya go bona gore ke dikantoro dife mo mafelong afe tseo go tlhokegang gore go tokafadiwe thebolotirelo mo go tsona.
tgt: ukuze kulungiswe inkinga, umnyango ubukeza umthelela ngokwezendawo ukuze kuhlonzwe izindawo lapho udinga khona ukwenza ngcono izinsiza zawo.

src: "re tla tsenya mo tirisong le naane la go tlhola kgotsofalo ya baagi, re lolamise le borakanelo jwa tlhaeletsano le go tlhomamisa gore bo dira ka tshwanelo, re bone tharabololo mabapi le baagi ba ba etelang dikantoro ba sa solofelwa le go oketsa sebaka sa dikanto robogorogelo, re tlhomamise le kgonagalo ya go tsenya mo tirisong dithulaganyo tse di ntšhwa tsa go theogela, re lebagane le dithulaganyo tse di bokoa, re goletse le diketelo tse di sa begiwang tsa batsama isibagolo mo dikantorong, re tokafatse kelelo ya tiro gape re tokafatse tsela ya tlhaeletsano le baagi," go tlhomamisa tona.
tgt: "sizogunyaza inhlolovo yokwe neliseka kwezakhamuzi, senze ukuthi isikhungo sokuxhu mana nezakhamuzi sisebenze ngokwezinga eliphezulu, sizothola isisombululo ngokuphathelene nabantu abeza esikhungweni abayinani elingaqageleki kanye nesikhala emahhovisi omnya ngo, ukubheka okungenzeka ngokuphathelene nohlelo olusha lwamashifu, ukulungisa uhle loxhumano lwamakhompyutha olungahlale lusebenza, ukwenyu swa kokuvakasha kwabaphathi abasezikhundleni eziphezulu emahhovisi ethu, ukuthuthu kiswa kokwenziwa komsebenzi kanye nokwenziwa ngcono kokuxoxisana nezakhamuzi," kuqinisekisa ungqongqoshe.

src: maanotiro ano, a tlile go tsengwa mo tirisong e le ditha rabololo tsa pakakhutshwe le tsa pakatelele.
tgt: lezi zinhlelo zokuzokwenziwa zizokwethulwa njengezindlela zokungenelela zesikhashana, zesikhathi esiphakathi nendawo kanye nezesikhathi eside.

src: tona o tlhalositse fa dikgwe tlho tseno di ka se rarabolo lwe ka tsela ya go dira o fetisa fela tiro mme o ikuetse mo setšhabeng gore se nne le bopelotelele fa lefapha le semeletse go tsenya ditharabololo tseno mo tirisong.
tgt: ungqongqoshe uchaze lezi zi ngqinamba ezingeke zisonjululwe ngokungenelela okusheshayo futhi wacela umphakathi ukuthi ube nesineke ngesikhathi umnya ngo wethula lokhu.

src: "re ikemiseditse tota go dira bojotlhe jwa rona go khutlisa mela le fa re ntse re itemogela matsapa le dikgwetlho tsa maemo a loago", go bua tona gigaba.
tgt: "simile sizibophezela ekwenzeni okusemandleni ethu ukuze si nqobe ukulwisana nemigqa, nangaphandle kwezingqina mba kanye nezinye izi nselele," kusho ungqongqoshe ugigaba.

src: pele ga kitsiso ya maanotiro ano, lefapha le ne la rebola thulaganyo ya go tlhatlhoba gore ke tsela efe e e maleba ya go tsamaisa le go laola mela le go tokafatsa ditirelo tsa yona.
tgt: ngaphambi kokuthi umemezele izinhlelo zozokwenza umnyango wenza umbiko wokuhlola ukuze uthole ukuthi ungakwazi kanjani ukulwisana nemigqa futhi wenze ngcono izinsiza zawo.

src: pego e tlhagisitse fa dithulaganyo tse di bokoa, kelelotiro e e sa lolamang le mesolatogamaano ya tlhaeletsano e e sa rulagangwang sentle e le tsona tse di tlogelang baagi ba sa kgotsofala le mela e meleele.
tgt: umbiko wabeka uhleloxhumano lwamakhompyutha olungahlale lusebenza njengalo kho kulindelekile, uhlelo lokwe nziwa komsebenzi olungasebenzi ngendlela efanele kanye nezindlela zokuxhumana ezingahlanga nisiwe ngendlela efanele eziholela kwizakhamuzi ezingenelisekile kanye nemigqa emide.

src: go ya ka tona, mabaka a a latelang a okeditse mathata le go feta:■ tsamaiso e e bokoa mo dikantorong tse dingwe.
tgt: ngokukangqongqoshe, lezi zinto ezilandelayo zenza inkinga ibe yimbi kakhulu: ■ ukungengameli ngendlela efanele kwamanye amahhovisi ■ ukungasetshenziswa ngendlela efanele kwabasebenzi.

src: ■ tiriso ya badiredi ka tsela e e senang mosola.
tgt: ■ ukungabikho kohlelo loku bhuka ukubonwa komuntu othile.

src: ■ tlhokego ya thulaganyo ya go tsenya kopo pele o iponatsha kwa dikantorong.
tgt: ■ ukungenganyelwa ngendlela esebenzayo kwemigqa.

src: ■ tsela e e sa lolamang ya go laola mela.
tgt: ■ ukusebenza ngesikhathi esi sodwa kwezinhlelo zokwe nziwa mathupha kanye nokwe nziwa ngemishini.

src: ■ go tlatsiwa ga diforomo ga bedi mo dipampiring le mo khomphutheng.
tgt: ■ ukungasabalaliswa ngokuli nganayo kwamahhovisi ngo kusekela ezibalweni zabantu.

src: ■ phatlalatso e e sa lekaneng ya dikantoro go ya ka mafelo.
tgt: ■ ukukhishwa kwemibiko enge yona ngokuphathelene nokuqedwa komazisi abalu hlaza abanamagabelo.

src: ■ tshedimosetso e e fosage tseng ka ga go fedisiwa ga dibukana tse ditala tsa makwaloitshupong.
tgt: ukungabi sezingeni kwezi mpawu ezikhombisa okuthile emahhovisi.

src: molemi wa mosadi o lema tsela ya gagwe ya katlego nonkululeko mathebula go golela mo bohu meng le go tshegiwa ka go bo a dira mo po laseng, mahlatse matlakane (20) ga jaana ke molemi yo o tletseng monyebo yo a le mang pherefere e tala.
tgt: umlimi wesifazane ophokophele empumelelweni nonkululeko mathebula okhule entula futhi ehlekwa ngokusebenza epulazini, manje usezakhele igama ngoku ba umlimi ovelele wophepha abaluhlaza, umahlatse matlakane (oneminyaka yobu dala engama20).

src: mahlatse o simolotse go ithaopa go dira kwa polaseng ya selegae ya pherefere e tala mo bokhutlhong jwa beke le fa dikolo di tswaletse a na fela le dingwaga di le 15 go thusa mme wa gagwe yo a neng a sa dire go ka fepa lapa la bona.
tgt: umahlatse waqala ukuvo lontiya epulazini lasendaweni elikhiqiza ophepha abaluhlaza njalo ngezimpelasonto noma kuvalwe izikole eneminyaka eyi15, futhi ezama ukusiza umama wakhe owayengase benzi ukuthi abe nokuya ngasethunjini.

src: matlakane o nna kwa gamoisamane mo buchum fela kwa ntlenyane ga polokwane kwa limpopo.
tgt: umatlakane uzinze egamoisimane ebuchum eduzane nasepolokwane elimpopo.

src: o rile le fa a itumelela maungo a mofufutso wa phatlha ya gagwe fela go ne go se bonolo.
tgt: nakuba edla izithelo zomsebenzi wakhe, uthi akukaze kube lula nenze.

src: "nna le bonnake re godile bokete.
tgt: "ngesikhathi ngikhula no dadewethu nabafowethu bekungelula neze.

src: balekane ba me ba ne ba ntshega fa ke simolola go dira kwa polaseng le go bua gore go lema ke tiro ya batho ba ba sa rutegang.
tgt: ontanga bami bebengenza inhlekisa ngesikhathi ngiqala ukuse benza epulazini bethi ipulazi elabantu abangafundile.

src: "seno se ne se nkutlwisa botlhoko fela ke ne ke batla go nna le kitso mo go tsa temo gore ke tle ke e sale morago jaaka tiro," a rialo.
tgt: "lokhu kwakungizwisa ubuhlungu kakhulu kodwa ngangifisa ukuqokelela ulwa zi ngezolimo ukuze ngolunye usuku ngigxile kulo mkha kha," elandisa.

src: fa matlakane a setse a bone bongwe jwa maitemogelo o ne a buisana le mong wa po lase eo a neng a ithaopile mo go yona johan nel ka ga go jala dipeo tsa gagwe le go tlhagisa dipherefere.
tgt: kwathi lapho umatlakane eseqokelele ulwazi, waqonda kumnikazi wepulazi ujohan nel, walapho ayevolontiya khona wacela ukutshala imbe wu alime ophepha abaluhlaza.

src: nel o ne a mo naya diheke tara di le pedi tsa lefatshe mo polaseng ya gagwe.
tgt: unel wamabela emhlabeni wakhe umhlaba ongamahekthara amabili.

src: "ke ne ke makaditswe ke tsela eo dipeo tse dinnye di ka fetogang go nna dimela tse di tlhagisang dipherefere tse ditala tse dikgolo.
tgt: "kwangimangaza ukuthi imbewu encane ingashintshaikhiqize ophepha abaluhlaza abakhulu.

src: go bona tsela eo dimela di neng di tlhokomelwa ka teng ka go dirisa menontsha go laola seboko go ntirile gore ke rate go lema le go feta.
tgt: ukubona ukuthi izitshalo zinakekelwa kanja ni ngomanyolo ukulwisana nezimbungulu kwangenza ngaba nothando lwezolimo kakhudlwana.

src: ka motso so oo ke ne ka itse gore seno ke sone se ke batlang go se dira," ga rialo matlakane.
tgt: kusukela ngale so sikhathi kwangicacela ukuthi ilokhu engifisa ukukwenza," ngokusho kukamatlakane.

src: morago ga go konosetsa mo phato wa marematlou matlakane o ne a tsaya ngwaga go ikhutsa le fa a ne a amogetswe kwa yunibesithing ya johannesburg gore a tle go ithutela tsa molao.
tgt: ngemuva kokuphothula umatekuletsheni umatlakane wahlala ekhaya nakuba inyuvesi yasegoli (iuj) yabe imamukele ukuba afundele umthetho.

src: o ne a boela gape kwa go nel go mo kopa go mo thusa gape ka tsa temo mme nel o ne a tshwaela gore a bue le kgosi mo kgaolong ya bona ka kgona galo ya go mo naya lefatshe.
tgt: wabuyela kunel wamcela ukuba amqwashise kabanzi ngezolimo, unel owamtshela ukuba akakhulume nenkosi yendawo ukuze imabele umhlaba.

src: morago ga go bona tswelope le ya gagwe mo polaseng ya ga nel kgosi ya selegae e ne ya mo naya diheketara di le 40 tsa le fatshe mo polaseng ya babirwa ba tau ya tswala fao ga jaana a tsamaisang kgwebo ya gagwe gona.
tgt: emva kokubona inqubekela phambili yakhe esebenza epu lazini likanel, inkosi yendawo yamabela umhlaba ongama hekthara angama40 epulazini ibabirwa ba tau ya tswala okuyilapho esebenzela khona.

src: marenjara a sireletsa ditshukudu dale hes motlhokomedi wa tikologo phakamani nyawo (26), yo a direlang kwa serapeng sa diphologolo sa umkhuze kwa kwazulunatal, ke mongwe wa batlhokomedi ba le 1 659 bao diphaka tsa bosetšhaba tsa aforika borwa (sanparks) di beileng tshepo mo go bona go tlhokomela tikologo mo dira peng tsa tlhago tsa setšhaba le tsa poraefete go ralala aforika borwa.
tgt: abaqaphi beziqiwu bavikela obhejane dale hes oqaphe ezemvelo uphakamani nyawo (oneminyaka yobu dala engama26), ozinze esiqiwini umkhuze game re serve esifundazweni sakwakwazulunatal, ongomunye wabaqaphi abayi1 659 abathweswe isouth african na tional parks (isanparks) umsebenzi wokuqapha ezemvelo eziqiwini zikahulumeni nezizimele eningizimu afrika yonkana.

src: nyawo, yo e leng karolo ya porojeke ya go tlhokomela tikologo eo e tsamaisiwang ke epwp , o dumela gore go botlhokwa go ruta baagi ka ga go tlhokomela tikologo.
tgt: unyawo, oyingxenye ya basebenzi abaqaphe ezemvelo ngaphansi kweepwp , ukholelwa ukuthi kusemqo ka ukufundisa umphakathi ngokunakekela imvelo.

src: "re tlhoka go ya kwa baaging le go ba tlhalosetsa gore ke goreng go le botlhokwa go babalela tlhago.
tgt: "sifisa ukuphuma sifundise umphakathi ukuthi kungani kubalulekile ukunakekela imvelo.

src: ke fela seo se tla dirang gore ba tlhaloganye botlhokwa jwa tlhago," a rialo.
tgt: kulaphoke umphakathi uzoqonda indima yezilwane nezinyamazane zasendle," ngokusho kukanyawo.

src: lenaane leno, leo le nayang bašwa ba aforika borwa bokgo ni jo ba bo tlhokang go dira kwa mafelong a pabalelo ya tlhago le dimela mmogo le ditshedi tse di farologaneng, le netefa ditse gore nyawo o kgona go tlhokomela balelapa la gagwe.
tgt: lolu hlelo, okuwuhlelo olufundisa intsha yaseningizimu afrika amakhono ewadingayo ukuze isebenze emkhakheni wokongiwa kwemvelo, izilwane zasendle nezitshalo, lolu hlelo lusize unyawo ukuba anakekele umndeni wakhe.

src: "ka ntlha ya tiro ya me, ntlo ya lapa la me jaanong e na le dithulelo tse di ntle tse ebile di sa neleng.
tgt: "umndeni wami usuno phahla olungavuzi, ngoba ngiyasebenza.

src: ke motlotlo gore ke bo ke bone tšhono eno," a rialo.
tgt: kuyangithoko zisa ukuthi ngathola leli thu ba," kusho unyawo.

src: tona ya merero ya tikologo ngaka edna molewa o bitsa batlhokomedi bano 'marenjara' gonne ba tshameka karolo e e botlhokwa mo go lwantsheng bosenyi jwa tikologo, jaaka go bolawa ga ditshukudu.
tgt: ungqongqoshe wezemvelo udkt.

src: "ngogola batlhokomedi ba tikologo ba le 1 659 ba ne ba romelwa kwa mafelong ao go bolawang ditshukudu ka bontsi go thusa ka tshireletso ya tikolo go.
tgt: edna molewa uhloniphe abaqaphi bezemvelo wababiza ‘ngabaqaphi beziqiwu’ ngo ba ngegalelo elikhulu aba nalo ukulwisana nobuge bengu kwezemvelo, obufana nokubulala obhejane.

src: ba tla natlafatswa go nna baambasatara ba ditshukudu mo dikgaolong tseno," a rialo.
tgt: "onyakeni odlule balinganiselwa kwi1 659 abaqaphi bezemvelo abasatshalaliswe ezindaweni ezidume kakhulu ngokubulala obhejane ukuze basize ngokuvikela ezemvelo.

src: lenaane le le ikemiseditse go tlhama ditiro adele schormann working on fire (wof) e tsamai sa lenaane le le tshwaraganetsweng la botsa maisi jwa molelo leo le nete faditseng ditiro go bašwa ba le bantsi go tswa kwa baaging bao go neng go ikgatolositswe bone.
tgt: bami ngomumo basungula amathuba omsebenzi adele schormann iworking on fire (iwof) ilawula uhlelo oludidi yelwe olongamele um lilo oseluqashe intsha eningi emiphakathini encishwe amathuba.

src: lenaane leno, leo le neelwang matlole ke le fapha la merero ya tikologo, le wela ka fa tlase ga lenaanekatoloso la ditiro tsa setšhaba (epwp).
tgt: ngokuxhaswa umnyango wezemvelo, lolu hlelo luwela ngaphansi kohlelo olunwetshiweyo lwemisebenzi yomphakathi (iepwp).

src: gape le neetse bašwa ba le bantsi bao ba sa kgoneng go bona tiro tsholofelo le go fitlhe lela katlego e e makatsang mo go thibeleng le mo go laoleng melelo ya naga, ka go fokotsa ditlamorago tsa ona.
tgt: lunikeza abantu abasha abangawutholi umsebenzi ithemba futhi seluphumelele kakhulu ekunqandeni naseku vikeleni umlilo emaqeleni, lwe hlisa nomthelela womlilo.

src: lenaane leno le thapa batho ba feta ba le 5 000 go tswa kwa baaging bao go neng go ikga tolositswe bone le go ba katisa ka ga tsibogelo ya molelo, thu to ka molelo, thibelo le taolo ya molelo mmogo le ka bokgoni jo bongwe, jo bo jaaka thuso ya potlako, go dira ka legong, go apaya, boitekanelo le pabalese go le ditlhaeletsano.
tgt: ngalolu hlelo sekuqashwe abantu abangaphezulu kwezi5 000 abaphuma emiphakathi ni entulayo futhi baqeqeshwa baqwashiswa ngomlilo, ezemfundo, ukunqanda nokuvimba umlilo nakwamanye amakhono, afana nosizo lokuqa la, ukubaza, ukupheka, ezempilo, ukuphepha nezokuxhu mana.

src: sebueledi sa wof lebogang maseko o tlhalositse gore le naane leno le tsepile bašwa le go thapa batho ba ba nang le dikgwetlho tsa mmele go dira kwa ditheong tsa bona tse di kwa di porofenseng.
tgt: ulebogang maseko wezokuxhumana kwiwof uthi lolu hlelo luqondiswe kubantu abasha futhi luqasha abantu abaphila nokukhubazeka uku ze basebenze ezizindeni zalo ezisezifundazweni.

src: "re gatelela thata mo tlhabo lolong ya bokgoni le go neela ditiro go bašwa bao ba sa tswang go konosetsa dithuto tsa bone tsa sekolo se segolwane kgotsa bao ba sa tswang go aloga go tswa kwa ditheong tsa thuto e kgolwane.
tgt: "sigcizelela kakhulu eku thuthukiseni amakhono futhi siqasha abantu abasha abasa phuma esikoleni noma abasanda kuthola iziqu ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme.

src: go bao ba leng mo lenaenong leno, 94% ya bone ke bašwa, 31% ya bone ke basadi mme diperesente di le tharo tsa bone ba na le dikgwetlho mo mmeleng," a netefatsa.
tgt: kula ba abaqashwe ngalolu hlelo, abangama94% abantu abasha, abangama31% abantu besi fazane kuthi abayi3% kube abantu abaphila nokukhubaze ka," egcizelela.

src: lorraine mokoena (31) go tswa kwa mpumalanga ke mongwe wa badiri bao ba ungwetsweng go tswa mo lenaaneng leno.
tgt: ulorraine mokoena (one minyaka yobudala engama31) wasempumalanga ungomunye wabaqashiwe futhi osezuze kulolu hlelo.

src: e sale a dira kwa wof lobaka lwa dingwaga di le 11 tse di fetileng.
tgt: usesebenze iminyaka eyi11 esebenzela iwof.

src: morago ga go konosetsa mo phato wa marematlou o ne a ketefalelwa ke go bona tiro lobaka lwa dingwaga di le pedi.
tgt: emva kokuphothula umateku letsheni, waba nenkinga engawutholi umsebenzi iminyaka emibili.

src: ausi wa gagwe o ne a mo bole lela ka ga lenaane la wof.
tgt: udadewabo wamtshela ngohlelo lwewof.

src: "tsamaiso ya kopo e ne e le bo ima.
tgt: "uhlelo lokufaka isicelo lwalungelula neze.

src: boitekanelo ke ntlhatheo e e botlhokwa thata ya tiro mme bathapiwa ba bantšhwa ba di risiwa go tlala seatla go bona fa ba na le bokgoni.
tgt: ukuba qa tha inqubo esemqoka kakhulu kulo msebenzi futhi abantu aba zoqashwa bavocavocwa kanzi ma.

src: gang fela fa o sena go falola teko eno, o tla tshwanelwa ke go falola tlhatlhobo ya boitekanelo jwa pholo pele katiso ya go tima molelo e simolola," a rialo.
tgt: uma uphumelela lokhu ku fanele uxilongwe ngodokotela kulaphoke uzoqala uqeqeshelwe ukuba isicishamlilo," esala ndisa.

src: mokoena o simolotse e le moti mamolelopotlana mme o ne a dira ka thata go bona maemo a moeteledipelemogolo wa setlhopha, a eteletse pele setlhopha sa batimamolelo ba le 18.
tgt: umokoena waqala eyisi cishamlilo esisezingeni eliphansi wasebenza wanyuselwa esikhundleni lapho engomunye wabaholi abaqavile, uhola izicishamlilo eziyi18.

src: "tiro eno e fetotse botshelo jwa me.
tgt: "lo msebenzi uyishintshile impilo yami.

src: ke nna fela ke tlamelang bonnake le banake ba babedi.
tgt: ekhaya imina ngedwa engisebenzayo ukusiza odadewethu nabafowethu kanye nezingane ezimbili.

src: jaanong ke kgona go fepa bale lapa la me le go tsenya banake sekolo," ga rialo mokoena.
tgt: manje ngiyakwazi ukunakeke la umndeni wami ngikhokhele nezingane zami esikoleni," ngokusho kukamokoena.

src: o dumetse gore tiro ya go tima molelo ka gale ke tiro ya banna mme jaaka mosadi mo ti rong eno o ithutile go nna segatlhamelamasisi.
tgt: "uvumile khona ukuthi ukuba isicishamlilo ngokujwayelekile umsebenzi wabantu besilisa futhi usefunde ukuba isikhondlakhondla kulo msebenzi njengoba engumuntu wesifazane.

src: mokoena o beile mogopolo wa gagwe mo go nneng motsamai si wa ditiragatso mo sebakeng sa dingwaga di le pedi tse di latelang.
tgt: umokoena ufisa ukuba umph athi olawula konke eminyakeni emibili ezayo.

src: seno se tla mo rwesa maikarabelo a ditlhopha tsotlhe tsa wof kwa mpumalanga.
tgt: lokhu kuzomenza angamele wonke amaqem bu ewof azinze empumalanga.

src: ka setlha sa melelo se re apa retse, mokoena o neelane ka maele a a latelang go thibela melelo ya dikgwa: o seka wa besa molelo mo mpaananeng fa o ka se kgone go o laola.
tgt: njengoba isikhathi samaqubu la omlilo sisondele, umokoe na usinikeze izixwayiso ezi landelayo zokuvikela umlilo wequbula: ungashisi umlilo endaweni evulelekile uma uzohlulwa ukuwulawula.

src: netefatsa gore o na le thuso e e lekaneng le didiriswa tse di tshwanetseng go go thusa fa go ka nna le matsapa ape.
tgt: qikelela ukuthi uthola usizo olwanele nezinsiza ukuze ubhekane nakho konke oku ngenzeka.

src: o seka wa tlogela molelo o tuka o le nosi.
tgt: ungawushiyi umlilo ungaqa shwe muntu.

src: tlhokomela maemo a bosa.
tgt: bheka isimo sezulu.

src: go fetola lephata la thuto e kgolwane amukelani chauke seemo sa thuto e kgo lwane ya aforika borwa mo nageng se a fetoga, mme thuto e kgo lwane ga se fela gore e a fi tlhelesega, mme gape le gore jaanong e lepalepane le di tlhokwa tsa intaseteri.
tgt: ukuguqula imfundo ephakeme amukelani chauke isimo semfundo ephakeme eningizimu afrika siyashintsha, njengoba imfundo ephakeme seyingeve nje ifinyeleleka kodwa seyiqondene kangco no ukuze ihlangabezane nezidingo zomnotho.

src: di phetogo tseno di botlhokwa ka gonne naga e ipaakanye tsa go baakanyetsa bašwa go ka simolola go tsena mo ma felong a bodirelo le go nna le seabe mo ikonoming.
tgt: izi nguquko ziyadingeka nje ngoba izwe lisebenzela uku lungiselela abantu abasha balungele umsebenzi kanye nokuba negalelo kwezo mnotho.

src: jaaka naga e keteka se gopotso sa kgwedi ya ba šwa, vuk’uzenzele e lebele la ntlha ya ka fao bašwa ba naga eno ba tlamelwang ke lefapha la thuto e kgolwane le katiso ka ditšhono ka teng gore ba atlege.
tgt: njengoba izwe libungaza inyanga yentsha, ivuk’uze nzele ibukisisa ukuthi intsha yezwe ihlinzekwa kanjani ngamathuba ngumnyango wezemfundo ephakeme nezokuqeqesha ukuze i phumelele.

src: fa e sale a thapilwe mo kgwe ding ya tlhakole mono ngwaga jaaka tona ya thu to e kgolwane le katiso, naledi pandor o neilwe tiro ya go diragatsa thuto e e sa lefelelweng go thusa baithuti ba ba humanegileng le "bao letseno la kwa mala peng a bo bona le sa ba kgo ntsheng go ka tlamelwa ka matlole a nsfas".
tgt: njengoba aqokwa ngonhlo lanja njengongqongqoshe wezemfundo ephakeme no kuqeqesha, unaledi pandor unikezwe umsebenzi wo kuqalisa uhlelo lwemfu ndo yamahhala kwaba mpofu kanye nalabo abazi wa njengezitshudeni ezingo ndingasithebeni.

src: morago ga boipelaetso jwa naga ka bophara jo bo tsereng nako e telele, ka setlhogo se se reng #feesmustfall , ka kgwedi ya sedimonthole go ne ga tlhagisiwa fa bašwa ba ba tswang mo malapeng ao letseno la bo bona le leng ka fa tlase ga r350 000 ka ngwaga ba tla amogela thu to le katiso e kgolwane ntle le go ntsha le ka peni o mo ntsho.
tgt: kulandela izibhelu zika zwelonke ngaphansi kwe siqubulo esithi: #feesmu stfall , kwamenyezelwa ngozibandlela ukuthi intsha evela emindenini lapho u mholo wakhona ungapha nsi kwezi350 000 zamarandi ngonyaka izothola imfundo yamahhala ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme nokuqeqeshwa.

src: tsenyotirisong e tswe letse mme e tla diraga diwa mo pakeng ya di ngwaga di le tlhano.
tgt: ukuqali swa kokusebenza kwalolu hlelo kuyaqhubeka futhi kuzoqhutshwa esikhathini seminyaka emihlanu.

src: sekema sa dibasari "tona pandor o dirile netefaletso ya fa tiragatso ya sekema sa dibasari e tswelela sentle ntle le kgoreletso epe.
tgt: isikimu somfundazeungqongqoshe pandor ukuqinisekisile ukuthi ukuqaliswa koku sebenza kwesikimu somfundaze ku yaqhubeka nga phandle kwe zinkinga.

src: "sekema se se ntšhwa seno sa dibasari ke kgatotsereganyo e e botlhokwa thata ya puso ya aforika borwa, mmogo le baagi ba aforika borwa ka gonne ke makgetho a bona a a duelelang seno" o rialo.
tgt: "isikimu esisha somfundaze siwuhlelo lukahulumeni waseningizimu afrika lokungenelela oluba luleke kakhulu futhi, empele ni, olwabantu baseningizimu afrika ngoba yintela yabo ekhokhela lokhu," kusho yena.

src: sekema seno sa dibasari se neelwa baithuti ba ba tsenang yunibesithi la ntlha le baithuti ba ba kwa dikholetšheng tsa thuto le katiso ya tiro ya matso go le ya setegeniki (ditvet), mo dingwageng tsotlhe tsa fa ba ntse ba le mo dithutong.
tgt: isikimu somfundaze sini kezwa izitshudeni eziqalayo enyuvesi kanye nasemako lishi okufundela umsebenzi wezobuchwepheshe bezandla nokuqeqeshwa (amatvet), kuwona wonke amazinga e minyaka yemfundo.

src: go tlamela sekema seno sa dibasari ka matlole, puso e tlametse lefapha ka madi a mangwe gape a le kanaka r7.166 bilione ya yona mo ngwageng wa 2018 – mme r4.581 bilione ya yona e bee tswe thoko go thusa baithuti ba dipholo tsa bona di ba letlang go ithuta kwa diyunibesithing, mme r2.585 bilione ya yona e tla nna ya baithuti ba dipholo tsa bona di ba letlang go ithuta mo ditvet.
tgt: ukuze kuxhaswe isikimu somfundaze, imali kahulu meni eyengeziwe eyizigidigidi zamarandi eziyi7.166 ibeke lwa eceleni ngowezi2018 – kule mali, eyizigidigidi zama randi eziyi4.581 ibekelwe izi tshudeni ezifanelekile ezifu nda emanyuvesi, ize ezigidigi di zamarandi eziyi2.585 yona ibe ngeyezitshudeni zamako lishi amatvet.

src: tona pandor o rile dikholetšhe tse dirutwa tsa tsona di dirang ka lephata le le rileng fela la thuto, di ka nna mafelo a bo tswerere a a tsamaelanang le go tlhagisa bokgoni jo bo maemo a a kwa godimo mo lephateng le ba tla bong ba dira ka lona.
tgt: ungqongqoshe pandor uthe amakolishi agxile emikhakheni ethile yezemfundo angase abe yizikhungo ezivelele ezaziwa ngokukhiqiza amakhono aphambili emikhakheni yazo.

src: sekai, kholetšhe e e rileng e ka ruta dithuto tsa mechanical engineering mme e nngwe e rute fela dithuto tsa ditiro tsa phofiso ya difofane, o tlhalosi tse jalo.
tgt: isibonelo, ikolishi elilodwa lingagxila kwezobunjiniyela bokukhenikha bese elinye ligxila kwezokushayelwa kwezindiza, kuchaza yena.

src: "ke dumela gore boka moso jwa dikholetšhe bo mo diatleng tsa go dira ka serutwa se le sengwe," o ne a tlaleletsa ka go rialo.
tgt: "ngikholwa ukuthi ukugxila emkhakheni owodwa kukho na kulele ikusasa lamakolishi," kwengeza yena.

src: "re batla go bona pharologa no.
tgt: "sifuna izinto ezahlukile.

src: ga re batle go bona dikho letšhe tsotlhe tsa rona di dira selo se se tshwanang.
tgt: asi funi wonke amakolishi enze into eyodwa."

src: "mdletshe o weditse dithu to tsa gagwe tsa marematlou ka 2006, pele a ka ya kwa durban university of tech nology go ithutela serutwa sa national diploma in ma ritime studies ka 2007. morago ga go wetsa s1 ka 2007 le s2 ka 2008 o ne a simo lola ka katiso ya gagwe ya dingwaga di le tharo kwa lewatleng, a direla safmarine shipping company .
tgt: "umdletshe waphothu la umatikuletsheni wakhe ngowezi2006, ngaphambi kokulibangisa edurban university of technology wayofundela inational di ploma kumaritime studies ngowezi2007.

src: ke moo a ithutileng go laola dikepe tse di rwalang merwalo, mo lewatleng le le bulegileng le go di supetsa fao di ka emang gone mo mafelong a a farologaneng a boemelakepe kwa yuropa, aforika le asia gore ba kgone go diragatsa tiro ya bone ya go rwala le go folo sa merwalo e e tsamayang ka sekepe le go pholopho tsa fa dikepe di santse di ba balesegile e bile di siametse le go ka tsaya maeto.
tgt: emva kokuphothula izi nga lakhe les1 ngowe zi2007 kanye neles2 ngowezi2008 waqhube ka nokuqeqeshwa kwa khe olwandle iminyaka emithathu, kanye nesafma rine shipping company.

src: dikepe le tsona di na le dibopego tse di farolo ganeng e bile dirwala me rwalo e e farologaneng, seo se kaya fa go tlhokagala gore motho a dire ka tso na ka ditsela tse di farolo ganeng," o ne a rialo mdle tshe, yo a itumelelang go dira le badirimmogo ba ditso tse di farologaneng, go tswa kwa dinageng tse di farologaneng.

src: dikgwetlho tsa bodirelogo nna motho wa mosadi mo bodirelowatle ke "dikgwetlho mo bodirelong jono," o ne a rialo mdletshe, yo a buileng ka ga dintlha tse di amang bong jaaka dingwe tsa di kgwetlho tse dikgolo ka ntlha ya fa bodirelo jono bo santse bo tletse ka badiri ba e leng batho ba banna.

src: "le fa batho ba basadi ba leka go nna karolo le go dira ka natla go bontsha gore le bona ba na le bokgoni fela jaaka ba nna, go le gantsi ga go bonolo.
tgt: "yize noma abesifazane bezama ukuzishutheka no kusebenza kanzima ukuze babonise ukuthi lokhu oku shiwoyo akulona iqiniso, kungumsebenzi onzima.

src: ke weditse matshwafo ka ga seno ka go nna ke akanya tse di ntle fela le go dira le batho gore ba nne le tlotlo mo go nna ka go bona tiro e ke a e dirang.

src: go atlega ga mdletshe go fedisitse maparego ano, go bonagetse fa a ne a amogela kabo fa a ne a dira jaaka motsamaisi wa mawatle wa setegeniki wa namaotshwe re.
tgt: impumelelo kamdletshe yokunqoba lezi zithiyo iyabonakala ngendondo ayi hlomulile njengemenenja eyi bamba kwezobuchwepheshe bemikhumbi nolwandle.

src: "ke amogetse kabo mo na kong e khutshwane ya go nna modiri yo o gaisang ka gonne ke bone thuno e e senang boso di ke na fela le beke ya ntlha ke dira mo maemong ao."
tgt: "ngahlomula ngendondo ngokuba ngovelele esikhathi ni esifushane ngenxa yokuthi umsebenzi wami wathola u mphumela wocwaningoma bhuku ongenagcobho evikini lokuqala ngibambe kulesi sikhundla."

src: o amogetse gape le kabo ya go nna mogaka ka diphalane 2017, ka ntlha ya go sireletsa dikepe mo setsuatsueng se se kgologadi seo durban e neng e simolola go se bona.
tgt: waphinde wahlo mula ngendondo ‘yokuba yiqhawe’ ngomfumfu wezi2017, ngokusiza imikhumbi esichothweni esasisibi kakhu lu esake sabonakala edurban.
