src: tiro ya mogapadikepe tse di maatla mdletshe o tlhalosa fa go nna mogapadikepe tse di maatla go kaya gore o jere maikarabelo otlhe a go gapa sekepe le gore matshelo a batho botlhe ba ba mo sekepeng a mo diatleng tsa gagwe.
tgt: umsebenzi womshayeli wezikebheumdletshe uyachaza ukuthi umshayeli wezikebhe cishe u lawula isikebhe sonkana kanye nabantu abagibele kuso.

src: baagi ba keteka tumelano ya lefatshe ya bokanaka r21 milione siya miti baagi ba kwa kapa bo tlhaba ba ipaakanye ditse go dira ka natla morago ga gore ba tlamelwe ka matlole gore ba gape kwa pele lenaane le le gapiwang ke baagi la taolo ya dirapa tsa diphologolo.
tgt: umphakathi ugubha isivumelwano sokubuyiselwa umhlaba obize izigidi zamarandi ezingama21 siya miti umphakathi wase mpumalanga kapa uzozibandakanya kwezemvelo ngemva koku thola ukuxhaswa ngezimali uhulumeni ukuze kuhlele lwe uhlelo lokubamba iqhaza kwibhizinisi lezilwane zasendle.

src: baagi ba kwa double drift gaufi le grahamstown ba kana ka 1 500 go tswa mo malapeng a le 264. ba ne ba fudusiwa mo nageng ya bona ke puso ya ciskei ka 1991, gore ba sutele serapa sa diphologolo tsa naga sa basweu.
tgt: umphakathi wasedouble drift ngasegrahamstown uhlangani sa abantu abayi1 500 abaqha muka emindenini engama264.

src: baagi bano mo malobeng ba ne ba neelwa lekwalobopaki la tulo tebang le naga eo, e ba e buseditsweng ka lenaane la pusetsodinaga go beng ba tsona.
tgt: basuswa emhlabeni wabo uhu lumeni waseciskei ngowe1991, ukuze kwakhiwe isiqiwi esasi nabanikazi abamhlophe.

src: go ya ka tonakgolo ya kapa botlhaba phumulo masualle, go dumelwane ka bokanaka r21 milione gore e duelelwe kutlwanelo eno ya lefatshe mme kgato eno e tla diragadiwa kgato ka kgato.
tgt: umphakathi usanda kuthola amatayitela omhlaba, owabu yiselwa kuwona ngokupha thelene nohlelo lokubuyiselwa komhlaba.

src: "eno ke kgato e kgologadi fa go tla mo tshomarelong ya tlha go le mo phetolothefosanong ya beng ba naga.
tgt: ngokukandunankulu wasempumalanga kapa uphumulo masualle, izigidi zamarandi ezi ngama21 sezibekelwe ukubuyi selwa kwalo mhlaba futhi lokhu kuzokwenziwa ngezigaba.

src: serapa seno se baakanyediwa gore se gaisane ka go tshwana le dirapa tse dingwe tsa mothale oo mme puso e tshegeditse baagi bano ka go ba tlamela ka dithuso tsa matlole, go ba neela diphologolo tsa naga le go ba katisa," ga rialo masualle.
tgt: lesiqiwi sisathuthukiswa ukuze sikwazi ukuncintisana nezinye iziqiwi futhi uhulumeni weseka umphakathi ngokuwuxhasa ngezimali, ngokunikela izilwa ne zasendle kanye nokuqeqe sha," kusho umasualle.

src: baagi bano, ba ba laolang serapa seno sa diphologolo tsa naga ka tshwaraganelo le setheo sa bojanala sa diphaka tsa kapa botlhaba (ecpta) ka fa tlase ga leina la likhayalethu communal property asso­ciation (lcpa), ba amogetse r6 milione go tswa kwa le fapheng la merero ya tikologo gore ba dire letsholo la dikgwebo tsa dirapa tsa diphologolo tsa naga mo serapeng seno sa diphologolo tsa naga sa bogolo jo bo kanaka diheketara di le 1 400 seo ba se reketsweng ke lefapha la tlhabololo ya metseselegae le ntšhwafatso ya naga.
tgt: umphakathi, ophethe isiqiwi ngokuhlanganyela nesikhu ngo sasempumalanga kapa esibhekelele iziqiwu kanye nezokuvakasha (iecpta) ngaphansi kwelikhayalethu communal property association (ilcpa), uthole izigidi zamarandi eziyisithupha kumnyango wezemvelo ukuze uthuthukise ibhizinisi lomnotho ovela kwezemvelo esiqiwini esingamahekthare ayi1 400 owasithengelwa umnyango wokuthuthukiswa kwezindawo zasemakhaya kanye nezi nguquko kwezomhlaba.

src: monnasetulo wa lcpa, mxo lisi ngesi, o rile baagi ba tsentse kopo ya bona ka 1998. ka 2012, baagi ba motse oo ba ne ba neelwa diheketara di le 23 500 tseo ga jaanong di okeditsweng ka diheketara di le 1 400 tsa serapa sa diphologolo tsa naga.
tgt: usihlalo welcpa, umxolisi ngesi, uthe umphakathi wafaka isicelo sawo sokunxeshezelwa ngowe1998.

src: beng ba indaseteri ya dikhemikhale ba bathobatsho kwa foreisetata ba tlhola ditiro more matshediso setlamo sa fa gae sa go apaya dikhe mikhale se thu sa go lwantsha bo tlhokatiro ka go tlhama ditiro di ka nna di le 70 kwa harri smith kwa foreisetata.
tgt: osozimboni abamnyama abenza amakhemikhali basefreyistata badala amathuba emisebenzi more matshediso inkampani yendawo eyenza amakhemikhali isiza ukulwa nokwentuleka kwemisebenzi ngokudala imi sebenzi ezinzile engama70 eharrismith efreyistata.

src: kevali chemicals ke setlamo sa ntlha sa bathobatsho se se apayang dikhemikhale tse di farologaneng tse di tlhatswang metsi, tse di phepafatsang le tse di phepafatsang mafelo a kgele loleswe le tse di kgomaretsang.
tgt: ikevali chemicals iyinka mpani yabantu abamnyama yokuqala efreyistata eyakha amakhemikhali okulanza ama nzi, ezenhlanzeko kanye nawo kuhlanza izindlu zangasese kanye neglu yokunamathisela.

src: setlamo seno se simolotswe ka ngwaga wa 2014 ke ditsala di le tlhano tse di nang le kitso e e tseneletseng mo maphateng a dikhemikhale, a go thota dilo tse di rekisiwang, a go rulaganya dilo tse di rekisiwang le a go dira dikgomaretsi.
tgt: le nkampani yasungulwa ngowezi2014 abangani abahlanu abangongoti ezimbonini zamakhemikhali, izimpahla ezithengisa ngokushesha, ukwe nziwa kwemikhiqizo, kanye nokunamathelisayo.

src: mokaedikhuduthamaga wa kevali chemicals funeka khumalo a re bis e tshegeditse setlamo sa gagwe gore a kgone go simolola ka tlhagisodikuno le go rekisa dikhemikhale tsa go tlhatswa meetsi, go phepafatsa le go peita ditshenekegi mmogo le tsa go kgomaretsa.
tgt: umqondisi wesigungu seziphathimandla wekevali chemicals ufuneka khumalo uthi ibis yaxhasa inkampani yakhe ukuze ithole imishini kanye nezinsizakusebenza ukuze iqale ukwakha kanye nokukhiqiza izinsiza zokuhla nza amanzi, ukuhlanza kanye nokubulala amagciwane kanye neglu yokunamathisela.

src: "kwa tshimologong re ne ra gapeletsega gore re tsenye madi gore kgwebo eno e simolole go dira fela kwa bofelong re ne ra amogela matlole go tswa kwa lefapheng la kgwebisano le inta seteri (dti) ka bis mmogo le ka koporasi ya tlhabololo ya diintaseteri (idc)," o ne a tlaleletsa jalo.
tgt: "ekuqaleni kwadingeka ukuthi sifake imali ukuze ibhizinisi liqale ukusebenza kodwa ekugcineni sathola umxhaso emnyangweni wezohwebo nezezimboni (idti) ngebis kanye nenkampani yokuthuthukiswa kwezimboni (iidc),’ kwengeza yena.

src: sekema seno ke lenaane la tlamelokamatlole la pholisi ya diintaseteri tsa bathobatsho leo maitlhomo a lona e leng go bulela ditšhono mo diintasetering tsa bathobantsho tse di direlang ikonomi ya naga ya aforika borwa ka ditsereganyo tse di tlhamaletseng, tse di totileng diintaseteri tse di rileng e bile di itlhalosa ka botlalo mo dithu song tsa matlole le mo tseo e seng tsa matlole.
tgt: ibis iwuhlelo lomxhaso lwenqubomgomo yosozimboni abamnyama ehlose ukuvulela amathuba osozimboni abamnyama abasebenza kumnotho waseningizimu afrika ngenxa yokungenelela okuqonde okuthile, okuphokophele ukuzuza okuthile nokuhlelwe ngendlela ethile okuphathelene kanye nokungaphathelene nezimali.

src: khumalo a re e mo tsere bokanaka r18 milione gore a simolole kgwebo eno mmogo le dikgwedi di ka feta di le 11 gore a simolole go ka iponela morokotso go tswa mo kgwebong eno.
tgt: ukhumalo uthe kwabiza izigidi zamarandi eziyi18 ukuze ibhizinisi liqale ukusebenza kanye nezinyanga cishe eziyi11 ukuze liqale ukwenza inzuzo.

src: setlamo seno se rekisa ditlhagisiwa tsa sona mo nageng yotlhe ya aforika borwa mmogo le kwa nageng ya uganda, ya namibia, le ya tanzania.
tgt: le nkampani ihambisa imikhi qizo yayo eningizimu afrika yonkana kanye naseuganda, enamibia, kanye nasetanzania.

src: khumalo a re seabe seo se tlamo seno se nang le sona mo matshelong a baagi se segolo thata go feta le sa ditšhono tsa diphatlhatiro.
tgt: ukhumalo uthe umthelela inkampani enawo ezimpilweni zabantu bendawo mkhulu kunokudala amathuba emisebenzi.

src: "mo godimo ga go tlhola ditiro mo baaging ba tikologo, re na gape le lenaane le le beeleditseng mo setšhabeng ka lona re thusa basadi ba kwa makeišeneng le ba kwa metseselegaeng gore ba kgone go ipulela dikgwebopotlana tsa bona tse di dirang ka go ikaapela didirisiwa tsa go phepafatsa mo malapeng le ditlhagisiwa tsa phepafatso ya kgelelaleswe," o tlaleleditse jalo.
tgt: "ngaphezu kokudala ama thuba emisebenzi kubantu bendawo, sinohlelo lokutshala izimali ngokuphathelene neze nhlalo esisiza ngalo abesifazane baselokishini kanye nasezindaweni zasemakhaya ukuthi baqale amabhizinisi amancane agxile ekwakheni imikhiqizo yokuhlanza ikhaya kanye nokuhlanza izindlu zangasese," kusho yena.

src: go direla bašwa ba kwa kwazulunatal ditiro hlengiwe ngobese bašwa ba ka feta ba le 20 kwa kwa zulunatal ba tla unngwelwa mo bodirelong jo bonšhwa jwa mahindra jo bo jang r95 milione jo bo tla betlang mofuta o mo ntšhwa wa dibene tseno o o bidiwang pik up kwa ntle ga durban.
tgt: ukudalwa kwamathuba emisebenzi entsha yasekzn hlengiwe ngobese abantu abasha aba ngaphezu kwa ma20 bakwazu lunatali bazohlomula embonini yemahindra ebize izigidi zamarandi ezingama95 ezokwakha uhlobo olusha lwamaveni angamadouble cab abizwa ngokuthi yipik up endaweni engaphandle kwasedurban.

src: bašwa ba ka nna 25 kwa kwazulunatal ba setse ba katisitswe le go ka neelwa ditiro fa go ne go bulwa bodirelo jono jo bontšhwa jwa mahindra.
tgt: abantu abasha abangama25 bakwazulunatali sebethole ukuqeqeshwa baphide baqashwa ngenxa yokuvulwa kwemboni entsha yemahindra.

src: badiredi bano ba katisi tswe ke setlamo sa lefatshe sa mahindra le setlamo se segolo sa mahindra mmogo le setlamo sa dithoto sa aih.
tgt: abasebenzi bathola ukuqeqeshwa ngokuba mbisana nenkampani yakwamahindra kanye neaih logistics futhi bazohanjiswa eindia ukuze bayothola okunye ukuqeqeshwa lapho kudi ngeka khona.

src: tekelelo ya tlhagiso mo lefelong leno e mo tseleng mme go lebeletswe gore go tlhagisiwe dijanaga di ka nna 2 000 ka ngwaga, mme mo tsamaong ya nako go tla tlhagisiwa dijanaga tse di ka fitlhang go 4 000 ka ngwaga.
tgt: ukulinga ukwakhiwa kwezimoto kwesikhungo kuyaqhubeka futhi kuli ndeleke ukuthi kukhiqizwe izimoto eziyizi2 000 ngonyaka, bese ngokuhamba kwesikhathi kube yizimoto eziyizi4 000 ngonyaka.

src: "peeletso eno e botlhokwa mo go direng gore dikgwebo di nne le tshepo e e tletseng mo go rona.
tgt: "ukutshalwa kwezimali kuhle ngokuphathelene nokuzethemba kwezama bhizinisi.

src: e tswelela go bontsha gore rona fano mo kwazulunatal re lefelo le le siametseng gore batho ba ka beeletsa mo go lona.
tgt: kuyaqhubeka nokukhombisa ukuthi lapha kwazulunatali siyindawo ekahle kwaba tshala izimali.

src: gape e romela molaetsa mo go bao ba etsaetsegang gore durban ke lefelo leo ba tshwanetseng go le tsaatsia fa go tla mo dipeeletsong,"ga rialo mokhudu thamaga (mec) wa lefapha la tlhabololo ya ikonomi, bojanala le merero ya tikologo sihle zikalala mo nakong ya fa bodirelo jono bo ne bo thankgololwa.
tgt: kuthu mela nomlayezo kulabo abalokhu bengabaza ukuthi idurban iyindawo ekahle ngokuphathelene nokutshalwa kwezimali," kusho ungqongqoshe wesifundazwe wokuthuthu kiswa kwezomnotho, ezokuvakasha nezindaba zemvelo usihle zikalala ngesikhathi sokwethulwa kwemboni.

src: o rile ditšhono tsa dipha tlhatiro tse di bulwang mo kgwebong eno di tla oketsa mo godimo ga bokgoni jo porofense e setseng e ntse e na le bona.
tgt: wathi amathuba okuqala okuqashwa azoqhamuka kule nkampani azoba nesandla ekwandiseni isibalo sabantu abanamakhono esifundazweni.

src: yo mongwe wa batho ba ba thapilweng ke sealogane sa dithuto tsa enjenering sthe mbiso mthembu yo a tlhalosi tseng gore o itumetse thata go bo a neilwe tiro eno.
tgt: omunye wabasebenzi ofunde wagogoda izifundo zobunjiniyela usthembiso mthembu okujabulela kakhulu ukuthi useyasebenza.

src: fa botshelo bo go naya ratsuru, jala dithapo tsa yone amukelani chauke lefapha la temothuo la kwa kapa bophirima le tsamaisa lenaane le le thusang balemirui ba bantšhwa le bao e leng kgale ba lema ka go ba tshegetsa go tloga motsing wa ntlha – fa ba tlhoka tlamelo ya ma tlole – go fitlha ba kgona go ikemela ka bobone.
tgt: uma impilo ikujikijela ngolamula, batshale amukelani chauke umnyango wezoli mo entshonalanga kapa uqhuba uhle lo olusiza abalimi abasha nasebethuthukile ngamasu okubeseka kusukela ngosu ku lokuqala lapho bedinga usizo lwezimali kuze kube yilapho sebezimele.

src: lenaane la tshegetso le tlhabololo ya balemirui leno le thusitse batho ba ba jaaka wayne mansfield (33) wa kwa paarl, yo a neng a rekisetsa malomagwe kwa marakeng wa motsekapa fa dikolo di tswaletse, mo nakong ya fa a ne a santse a tsena sekolo, mme ga ja anong o romela diratsuru tsa gagwe kwa dinageng tsa kwa ntle tseo a di lemileng mo polaseng eo ba mo hiri seditseng yona.
tgt: uhlelo lokwesekwa no kuthuthukiswa kwabalimi selusize abantu abasha aban jengowayne mansfield (one minyaka engama33 ubuda la) wasepaarl, osuke ekubeni asebenze njengomdayisi kamalume wakhe emakethe yasekapa ngesikhathi esa funda isikole njengoba ma nje esedayisa olamula bakhe abatshale esiqeshini somhla ba asiqashile.

src: dingwaga di le 10 tse di fetileng, fa a ne a le dingwa ga di le 23 mme a setse a itshi moletse kgwebo, mansfield o ne a gana tšhono ya go dira kwa polaseng eo a neng rwa la diratsuru kwa go yona go di rekisa.
tgt: eminyakeni eyishumi eye dlule, ngesikhathi engusoma bhizinisi oneminyaka enga ma23 ubudala, umansfield walahla ithuba lokusebenza epulazini ayebheka kulona olamula ukuze athengise kabusha.

src: mo nakong eo o ne a sena kgatlhego go le kalo mo temothuong.
tgt: ngaleso sikhathi wayengenandaba nokulima.

src: le fa go le jalo, dingwaga di se kae fela morago ga seno, o ne a fetola mogopolo wa gagwe fa a bona gore dira tsuru di rekisiwa thata.
tgt: kodwake, iminyaka emba lwa eyalandela, wawushi ntsha umqondo lapho ebona ukukhula kwesidingo sola mula.

src: "ke ne ka lemoga gape gore balemirui ba dira seo rona barekisi re se dirang – ba ne ba phuthela ditholwana tsa bona mme ba di rekisa kwa marakeng wa motsekapa.
tgt: "ngaphinde ngabona uku thi abalimi babenza okwa kwenziwa yithina badayisi abahamba ngezinyawo – babepakisha isitokwe sabo bese besidayisa emakethe yasekapa.

src: ke ne ka lemoga gore go ise go ye kae rona jaaka barekise re tla tlhoka mojo," o ne a re jalo.
tgt: ngabona ukuthi kungekudala thina badayisi abahamba ngezinyawo sizo phelelwa indawo yokudayi sa, "kusho yena.

src: ka ngwaga wa 2013, molemirui mo kgaolong ya bona o ne a dumela go ruta mansfield le go mo adima di heketara di le 12 tsa naga.
tgt: ngomnyaka wezi2013, umlimi wasendaweni wavu ma ukucebisa umansfield fu thi wamqashisela amahektha ayi12 omhlaba.

src: o ne gape a mo tsenyetsa metsi gore mansfield a kgone go lema.
tgt: waphinde wamfakela uhlelo lokunisela olwenza umansfield akwazi ukutshala.

src: ka ngwaga wa 2015, o ne a setse a kgona go romela kwa ntle ditone di le 31 tsa ratsuru mme palo eno e ne ya menagana thata go ka nna ditone di le 168 ka ngwaga wa 2016. seno ke ka ditebogo go tswa mo katisong le thu song eo a e neilweng ke ba lenaane la tshegetso le tlhabololo ya balemirui e leng seo se mo kgontshitseng gore a amogele madithuso a lenaane la tshegetso ya te mothuo ka botlalo (casp) ka ngwaga wa 2015, mme seno se ne sa mo kgontsha gore a tsetsepele thata le go atlega jaaka molemirui.
tgt: ngonyaka wezi2015, wa kwazi ukudayisa ngapha ndle lwaleli cishe amathani angama31 kalamula futhi ngowezi2016, lesi sibalo sakhuphuka kakhulu saba ngamathani angu168.

src: go tlhoma bokgoni mabapi le balemiruimaitlhomo a lenaane la tshegetso le tlhabololo ya balemirui ke go tlhoma bo kgoni mabapi le baagi le batho bao mo malobeng ba neng ba ileditswe ditšhono, bogo losegolo bajalefa ba pusetso ya dinaga.
tgt: ngenxa yenkuthazo nosi zo oluvela kuhlelo lokwe sekwa nokuthuthukiswa kwabalimi okwamenza wathola isibonelelo sohle lo oluphelele lokwesekwa kwezolimo (icasp) ngowe zi2015, wakwazi ukubeka isisekelo esiqinile futhi wa chuma njengomlimi.

src: e thusa balemirui ba ba supogang, ba bannye le balemirui bao ba tshotseng dipolasa tse dinnye.
tgt: ukwandisa nokuhlomisa abalimiuhlelo lokwesekwa nokuthuthukiswa kwabalimi luhlose ukwandisa noku chumisa imiphakathi yabantu ababengabonelelwa ngaphambilini, ikakhulukazi abahlomuli bohlelo lokwabiwa kabusha komhlaba.

src: motsamaisi wa porojeke ya ditirelo tsa tshegetso ya tlhabololo mo temothuong kwa lefapheng la temothuo la porofense ya kapa bophirima shaheed martin a re lenaane leno le thusitse balemirui gore ba ikatlapele ka bobona.
tgt: lu bhekelela abalimi abasafufusa, abalimela ukuziphilisa, aba limi abancane nabahwebayo.

src: nhi tsholofelo ya tlhokomelo ya boitekanelo e e tokafetseng vukuzenzele unnamed tona ya boitekanelo ngaka aaron motsoa ledi a re molaotlhomo o o kwalolotsweng sešwa wa inšorense ya bosetšhaba ya boitekanelo (nhi) o tla toka fatsa boleng jwa tlhokomelo ya boitekanelo mo nageng ya aforika borwa.
tgt: inhi iwuhlelo lezinsizakalo zempilo eziphuculiwe vukuzenzele unnamed ungqongqoshe wezempilo udkt aaron motsoaledi uthi umthethosivivinywa womshuwalensi wezempi lo kazwelonke (inhi) uzo thuthukisa izinga lezinsizaka lo zempilo eningizimu afrika.

src: motsoaledi o ne a bua mo malobeng kwa tsibosong ya bobegakgang moo a neng a rebola molaotlhomo o o kwalolotsweng sešwa wa nhi mmogo le molaotlhomo o o kwalolotsweng sešwa wa dikema tsa tlhokomelo ya boitekanelo.
tgt: umotsoaledi ubekhulu ma kamuva nje enkundleni yabezindaba lapho ambule khona umthethosivivinywa wokuchibiyelwa kwenhi kanye nomthethosivivinywa wokuchibiyelwa kwezikimu zezokwelapha.

src: melaotlhomo eno e tla baakanya tsela gore tlho komelo ya boitekanelo e fitlhe lesege bonolo ka nhi.
tgt: le mithethosivivinywa izo phendla indlela yokufikelela kangcono izinsizakalo zempi lo ngenhi.

src: molaotlhomo ke sekwa lwa sa molao.
tgt: umthethosivivinywa uyinguqulo yomthetho ewuhlaka.

src: melaotlhomo e mentsi e kwalwa ke mafapha a puso a laetswe ke tona ya lefapha leo.
tgt: imithethosivivinywa eminingi ibhalwa yiminyango kahulu meni ngaphansi kokuqondi swa ngungqongqoshe ofane lekile.

src: molaotlhomo o tshwanetswe gore o amoge lwe ke kabinete pele o ka isi wa kwa palamenteng.
tgt: umthethosivivinywa kufanele ugunyazwe yikha bhinethi ngaphambi kokuba uthunyelwe ephalamende.

src: go itsisewe ga melaotlho mo eno go raya gore aforika borwa e gaufi le go fitlhelela tlhokomelo ya boitekanelo ya botlhe e leng seo se rayang gore fa gautshwane nhi e tla nna molao.
tgt: ukwethulwa kwale mithetho sivivinywa yomibili kusho ukuthi iningizimu afrika isiseduze ekufinyeleleni izi nsizakalo zempilo ezingujike lele okusho ukuthi inhi ma duze nje izoba ngumthetho.

src: nhi ke thulaganyo ya tlamelo ka matlole e e tla nete fatsang gore baagi botlhe ba aforika borwa ba tlamelwa ka tlhokomelo ya boitekane lo, go sa kgathalesege maemo a bona a tiro le bokgoni jwa bone jwa go tlisa letseno mo letloletlamelong leno.
tgt: inhi yindlela yokuxhasa ngezimali ezoqinisekisa uku thi zonke izakhamuzi zase ningizimu afrika zihlinze kwa ngezinsizakalo zempilo ezibalulekile, kungakhatha liseki isimo sabo sokusebe nza kanye nokuthi bazokwazi na ukuba nabakufakayo ngqo esikhwameni.

src: motsoaledi o rile puso e itse sentle gore go batho bangwe ba ba dumelang gore go bo tlhokwa gore pele re ka simo lola go bua ka nhi re bo re tshwanetse pele ke gore re simolole ka go baaka nya thulaganyo ya rona ya boitekanelo.
tgt: umotsoaledi uthe uhulume ni wazi kahle kamhlophe uku thi abanye abantu bakholelwa ukuthi ngaphambi kokukhu luma ngenhi, kunesidi ngo sokulungisa izinsizakalo zempilo ezikhungweni zokwe lapha zikahulumeni ezidonsa kanzima kuqala.

src: o rile puso e itse sentle ka matsapa a boleng jo bo tlho baetsang le ditirelo tse di bokowa mo thulaganyong ya rona ya tlhokomelo ya boitekanelo.
tgt: uthe uhulumeni uzazi kahle izinkinga zekhwalithi embi kanye nokuntuleka koku sebenza kahle ohlelweni lwezempilo lukahulumeni.

src: ndp , motsoaledi o tlhalo sitse jalo, e supile ntlha eno e sa ikobonye gore go tsenya tirisong nhi, go tla samaga na le boleng jo bo fokolang jwa tlhokomelo ya boiteka nelo mmogo le dituelelo tse di kwa godimo tsa tirelo ya boitekanelo mo ditheong tsa poraefete.
tgt: umotsoaledi uthe uhle lo lokuthuthukiswa kwe zwe (indp) luye lwayi gqamisa ngokungananazi nokuthi ekuqaliseni uku sebenza kwenhi, izinga eliphansi lezinsizakalo ze mpilo kanye nezindleko ezi khona zezinsizakalo zempilo embonini ezimele kudingeka kubhekanwe nazo.

src: e tla re fa dintlha tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa tsa melaotlhomo di ntse di atlhaatlhiwa, lefapha lone ka fa letlhakoreng le lengwe le tla tsenya tirisong diporo jeke di ka nna nne tsa nhi mme tsone di tla akaretsa ya boitekanelo kwa dikolong, ya boitekanelo jwa batho ba ba sa itekanelang mo tlhogong, ya boitekanelo jwa basadi ba ba leng mo mmeleng mme ba na le dikgwetlho tse di rileng mo boimaneng jwa bone mo dipetleleng le mo maokelong a bomme a le 22 ao a itemo gelang ka bontsi dikgwetlho tsa mothale oo mmogo le ya boitekanelo jwa malwetse a kankere, go totilwe bogolo segolo a porofense ya gau teng le ya kwazulunatal, mme go sa ikgatoloswe a di porofense tse dingwe.
tgt: ngenkathi izichibiyelo ezi bhekiselwe kwimithethosivi vinywa zidingidwa, umnya ngo uzoqalisa ukusebenza okungenani amaphrojekthi amane enhi, okuzobanda kanya izinsizakalo zempilo ezikoleni, izinsizakalo zempi lo zalabo abakhubazeke ngo kwengqondo, izinsizakalo zempilo zabesifazane aba khulelwe abanezinkinga ngokukhulelwa kwabo ezi bhedlela ezingama22 ezithi nteka kakhulu kanye nokwe lashwa komdlavuza (ionco logy), ngosizo oluqondile egauteng nakwazulunatali, kodwa futhi nezinye izifunda zwe zingashaywa indiva.

src: motsoaledi o tlhalositse gape gore dituelelo tse di duelwang kwa makaleng a poraefete a ditirelo tsa tlho komelo ya boitekanelo di feta dipotla tsa baagi ba le bantsi, mme khomišene ya dikgai sano e tlhomile moatlhodimo golo wa mo malobeng sandile ngcobo go sala morago ntlha eno ya dipatlisiso tsa dituelelo mo ditirelong tseno mo makaleng a poraefete a tlhokomelo ya boitekanelo.
tgt: umotsoaledi uphinde wathi izindleko zezinsizakalo ze mpilo embonini ezimele azi finyeleleki kuzakhamuzi ezi ningi, njengoba owayelijaji eliyinhloko usandile ngcobo ebekwe ukuba ahole ikho mishini yezokuncintisana ukuze kuqhutshwe inhlolo vo ngezindleko zezinsizakalo zempilo embonini ezimele.

src: "dintlha tseno tse di kwa lolotsweng sešwa tse re di tsenyang tirisong tseno di imolola bogolosegolo ba lwetse bao ba iphitlhelang ba jarile bokete ka ntlha ya go tlhoka madi," o tlhalositse jalo.
tgt: "izichibiyelo esizethulayo zihlose ukuhlinzeka usizo oludingwa kakhulu yiziguli ezizithola zihlupheka kakhu lu," kusho yenaumotsoaledi uthe isichibi yelo sokuqala somthethosivi vinywa sizoqeda ukukhoki swa kwabantu imali engeziwe.

src: motsoaledi o rile sa ntlha seo dintlha tseno tse di kwalolo tsweng sešwa tsa molao tlhomo se tla se dirang ke go fedisa kgang ya dituelelo tsa tlaleletso.
tgt: izinkokhelo ezicazelwa umthengi zichaza ukuthi isikimu sikhokha ingxenye ethile yesikweletu umhlinze ki kungaba isibhedlela noma udokotela ozimele – ayibize isiguli.

src: lefelo la kamogelo le phetiso ya dikopo (cach) la 2018 vukuzenzele unnamed cach ke eng?
tgt: icentral application clearing house (icach) yowezi2018 vukuzenzele unnamed iyini icentral application clearing house?

src: cach ke thulaganyo ya nakwana e e tlhodilwe ke lefapha la thuto le katiso tse di kgolwane go thusa baithuti ba ba solofetsang ba ba batlang go tsenela thulaganyo ya katiso le thuto ya morago ga go konosetsa dithuto tsa sekolo (pset) mme ba tobane le dikgwetlho tsa gore: ba ne ba dirile kopo ka nako kwa ditheong tsa thuto tseo ba neng ba rata go ithuta kwa go tsona mme dikopo tsa bona tsa se amogelwa mme jaanong go setse go le thari gore ba ka dira dikopo kwa ditheong tse dingwe.
tgt: central application clearing house, ebizwa ngokuthi yicach, umzamo wesikhashana womnyango wemfundo ephakeme nokuqeqesha yasungulwa umnyango wemfundo ephakeme nokuqeqesha ukuze isize abafundi abafuna izikhala zokufunda ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme abafisa ukungena ohlelweni lwemfundo elandela ukuqeda isikole nokuqeqeshwa (ipset) kodwa kungenzeka ukuthi ibhekene nesimo lapho: befake isicelo kusenesikhathi ezikhungweni zemfundo abazikhethile kodwa izicelo zabo zachithwa, manje osekuphele isikhathi sokubhalisa kwesinye isikhungo.

src: badiradikopo ba ba solofetsang ba ba sa dirang dikopo ka ntlha ya fa dipholo tsa bona tsa mophato wa bo 11 di ne di le bokoa mo ba neng ba ka se amogelwe mme ga jaanong ba itemogela gore dipholo tsa bona tsa mophato wa bo 12 di tokafetse mo di ka ba kgontshang go ka amogelwa.
tgt: labo abazoba ngabafundi abangasifakanga isicelo ngoba bengakwazanga ukuthola imiphumela edingekayo kubanga le11 ukuze babhalise kodwa bathole ukuthi imiphumela yabo yebanga le12 iyahlangabezana nalokho okudingekayo ukuze babhalise.

src: ba ne ba sa dira kopo go sa le gale ka mabaka a a rileng kgotsa ba ne ba sa dira kopo ka gotlhe.
tgt: abangazange basifake isicelo ngesikhathi ngenxa yesizathu esithile noma abangazange basifake nhlobo isicelo.

src: ba se na kitso ya gore ba tla ithutela eng morago ga materiki.
tgt: abangazi nhlobo ukuthi bazofundani lapho beqeda umatikuletsheni.

src: ba na le kakanyo ya gore ba ka ithutela eng fela ba se na bonnete jwa gore se ba batlang go ithutela sone ke sone naa.
tgt: abazi kancane ngalokho abafuna ukukufunda kodwa abangenasiqiniseko ukuthi ingabe lo mkhakha ubalungele na.

src: ditirelo tse di abelwang ke cach dikopo tsa ditšhono tsa go ithuta tsa pset (kwa diyunibesiting, kwa diyunibesiting tsa thekenoloji, kwa dikholejeng tsa katiso le thuto ya diatla le ya setegeniki (ditvet) mmogo le kwa bothating jwa lekala la thuto le katiso (diseta).
tgt: imisebenzi ehlinzekwa icach izicelo zamathuba okufunda epset (emanyuvesi, emanyuvesi obuchwepheshe, emakolishi emfundo yezobuchwepheshe namakhono emisebenzi kanye nokuqeqeshwa kanye nesector education and training authorities).

src: tshedimosetso ka ga thuso ya matlole (tshedimosetso ka nsfas).
tgt: ulwazi mayelana nosizo lwezimali (ulwazi lwenfsas).

src: ditirelo tsa tlhabololo ya ditiro (kaelo, tshedimosetso, keletso le togomaano ya ditiro/tshedimosetso ka ga tlamelo ka matlole).
tgt: imisebenzi yokuthuthukisa amakhono omsebenzi (ukwelulekwa, ulwazi, iseluleko kanye nokuhlelela umsebenzi/ulwazi ngalokho ongakukhetha maqondana noxhaso kanye nokuthola imali yokufunda).

src: tshegetso ya badiri ka diatla (tikwatikwe ya naga ya tshegetso le tlhabololo ya badiri ka diatla).
tgt: ukwesekwa kwabafundela imisebenzi yezandla (isikhungo sokweseka ukuthuthukiswa kwemisebenzi yezandla kuzwelonke).

src: tirelo ya cach e simolola go dira ka la bo 3 ferikgong 2018, morago fela ga go rebolwa dipholo tsa ditlhatlhobo tsa setefikeiti sa naga sa dithuto tse dikgolwane (nsc) mme e tla dira go fitlha kwa bofelong jwa tlhakole 2018. cach e dira jang?
tgt: imisebenzi yecach iqala ngomhla ka 3 kumasingana 2018, ezinsukwini ezimbalwa kusanda kuphuma imiphumela yokuhlolwa yensc futhi izosebenza kuze kube sekupheleni kukanhlolanja 2018. icach isebenza kanjani?

src: kgato ya bo 1: barutwana ba ba sa amogelwang kwa ditheong tsa thuto tseo ba di kwaletseng, kgotsa bao ba batlanang le ditšhono tsa go ithuta tsa pset, ba ka ikgolaganya le cach ka mogala o o sa duelelweng wa (0800 356 635), ka webesaete (www.
tgt: isigaba 1: abafundi abangasitholi isikhala ezikhungweni abafake izicelo kuzo, noma abafuna amathuba okufunda epset, bangaxhumana necach kunombolo yamahhala (0800 356 635), iwebhusayithi (www.

src: dhet.
tgt: dhet.

src: gov.
tgt: gov.

src: za) kgotsa ka sms ya ka gale (ka go romela leina le nomoro ya lekwaloitshupo ka sms mo go 49200) gongwe ba ka ikwadisa mo inthaneteng.
tgt: za) noma ngomyalezo wesms ojwayelekile (thumela igama ngesms ku 49200) noma bangabhalisa online.

src: o ka iponela gape tshedimosetso e e tseneletseng mo tsebeng ya bona ya facebook ya cach_sa.
tgt: eminye imininingwane ungayithola ekhasini labo le facebook (cach_sa).

src: kgato ya bo 2: badiredi ba tikologo eno ba tla letsetsa mogala moithuti yo a solofetsang ntle le tuediso epe, go tswa kwa tikwatikweng ya megala mme ba kwadise dintlha tsa gagwe tsotlhe tse di tlhokegang mo sefalanatshedimosetsong sa cach, ba bontsha seo moithuti a batlang go ithutela sone le porofense eo a batlang go ithutela kwa go yona.
tgt: isigaba 2: amaejenti azoshayela umfundi, ofuna isikhala sokufunda esikhungweni semfundo ephakeme, ucingo mahhala, ngokusebenzisa isikhungo sezingcingo, kubhaliswe nemininingwane kusizindalwazi secach, kuhlonzwe umkhakha umfundi awubhalisele kanye nesifundazwe afisa ukufunda kuso.

src: kgato ya bo 3: dintlha tsa modirakopo le dipholo tsa gagwe tsa materiki di tla netefadiwa mme tsa romelwa kwa ditheong tsa thuto e kgolwane go leka gore gongwe di ka amogelwa le go ka tsengwa mo lenaaneng la bone.
tgt: isigaba 3: imininingwane eqondene nomfakisicelo kanye nemiphumela kamatikuletsheni kuzoqinisekiswa futhi kudluliselwe esikhungweni semfundo ephakeme nokuqeqesha ngokuzenzakalela ukuze mhlawumbe umfundi abhaliswe noma afakwe esikhungweni.

src: kgato ya bo 4: tirelo ya cach e tla totobatsa tshedimosetso e e ka ga morutwana morago ya e romela kwa ditheong tsa thuto tseo di santseng di na le diphatlha.
tgt: isigaba 4: imisebenzi yecach izoqinisekisa imininingwane yomfundi futhi iyidlulisele ezikhungweni ezisenezikhala.

src: mo go nang le diphatlha mme badirakopo ba kgotsofatsa ditlhokwa, ditheo tseo di tla ikgolaganya le badirakopo ka tolamo.
tgt: lapho kukhona izikhala, abafakisicelo behlangabezana nakho konke okudingekayo, kuzoxhunywana nezikhungo ngqo.

src: dintlha tse di tshwanetsweng go elwa tlhoko cach ga e kitla e solofetsa badiradikopo gore ba tla bona phatlha ya go ithuta.
tgt: amaphuzu okumele aqashelwe icach ayikwazi ukuqinisekisa umfakisicelo ukuthi uzosithola isikhala.

src: cach ga e kitla e itse gore setheo se tla ikgolaganya neng le modirakopo gore a tsengwe mo phatlheng e e bulegileng.
tgt: icach ayikwazi ukubona ukuthi isikhungo sizomthinta nini umfakisicelo ukuze mhlawumbe athole isikhala.

src: cach e thusa jang badiradikopo ba ba sa itseng gore ba ka ithutela eng kgotsa bao ba sa kgotsofatseng ditlhokwa tsa go ka tsenela thulaganyo ya pset?

src: tirelo ya cach gape e dira mmogo le ditirelo tsa naga tsa tlhabololo ya ditiro (cds) eo e thusang ka tshedimosetso e e tletseng le dikeletso mabapi le ditiro tse di farologaneng ka ga: ditsela tsa go dira ditiro le dithuto tse di farologaneng.
tgt: imisebenzi yecach isebenza ngokubambisana nesikhungo sokuthuthukisa imisebenzi kuzwelonke (incds) esiza ngokuhlinzeka ngolwazi lwezemisebenzi olunzulu kanye neseluleko mayelana: imisebenzi kanye nemikhakha efundwayo ukukhetha isifundo.
